creampuff-adventure
Summary
Welcome to #creampuff-adventure! This is the start of the #creampuff-adventure channel.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 28-08-2023 23:21
## Begin: Vengeance Tastes so Sweet (Nyr's Arc Quest)
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 29-08-2023 05:18
*Nyr has developed a little routine in the cage that is Barovia -- at least the valley is large enough, with enough fearsome monsters to slay, enough friendships to test, and enough exotic locales to explore that it doesn't feel like too stifling of a cage. Aside from visiting Bethel to replenish his quiver of arrows infused carefully by artisans with magic, Nyr also visits Beory's stand at the Vistani camp once in a while. Sometimes, Nyr eyes a piece of equipment or spell scroll or special materials from a different plane that intrigues him, but most times, it's just for the reminder that a world outside of the misty barriers exists. As ironic and taunting as the fact is, these goods are able to travel freely in and out of Barovia when they sit in a Vistana's wagon, but Nyr cannot return home to the Feywild. One day, as Nyr quietly browses the goods on display, usually preferring to not draw the attention of salespeople who aggressively peddle their goods, Beory waves him over to his table.*
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 29-08-2023 05:22
As Nyr draws near, intrigued, the jolly merchant greets him. "Hello sir, you are the Eladrin known as Nyr, correct?" Beory opens a small satchel and produces a small, unmarked envelope as well as a small pouch about the size of a palm. "One of my traders who just returned from the Feywild was paid a big tip to deliver this to you. I'm not sure how they know you're here, or what's in the pouch," he says curiously, "but we are not in the business to be nosy." He chuckles. "Lemme know if there's anything you see here today that piques your sharp eye, alright?"
Nyr BOT 29-08-2023 22:21
The Eladrin eyes Beory curiously. He wasn't one to accept things from strangers. But a message from home was too good to pass up. He takes the letter and pouch with a thousand things running through his head. "Curious. Thank you sir, I believe I'll keep browsing" He stashes the things in his bag and walks around the market a bit. He's keeping an eye out, as he always does, for anything suspicious. Once he determines things are good, he find a secluded little tent off to the side, one filled with supplies and unoccupied. Not only was there a message from the outside, the fact that someone that knew him, also knew where he was, had him filled with hesitation. And excitement. He opens the letter
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 30-08-2023 01:19
The letter opens, in an elegant but not overly embellished script,
‚ÄúDearest Shadowlark,
*This name shoots a bolt of lightning down Nyr's spine. He hasn't heard or seen this name, his code name, for nearly a century. This makes his vision blur, as memories come flooding back: the challenge of finding a specific exotic plant or fungus, the thrill of smuggling it across planar boundaries, the relief of finally dropping off the package and knowing that he can go home to... ...to sweet Amelia.* Nyr shakes himself off this train of thought and refocuses on the letter, intrigued by how the sender knows a secret agent code that only those who worked for the Wisps would know. He reads on.
How curious that you‚Äôve ended up in a place such as Barovia. By choice or by accident, I wonder? I shan‚Äôt waste paper and ink, so I‚Äôll get straight to the point: I have discovered where the Wisps ringleaders hang out, and therefore, where you can find Narkhorn. I trust you will know what to do when you find him.
Nyr feels a rush of complicated feelings rise within him at the mention of the eladrin's name. Narkhorn... always so smug. Ever cunning. Ruthless and cruel when his expectations are not met, as Nyr experienced personally firsthand...
Their hideout turns out not to be located in the Feywild at all. The ringleaders each reside in their separate, hidden locations, extremely tough to track. However, once every 12 moon cycles, they convene in a pocket dimension you can only reach by astral projection to plot out their next year‚Äôs plans.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 30-08-2023 01:20
"Astroprojection?" Nyr rolls his eyes. These bastards really think what they do is so important, that smuggling these goods across the planes really made them that dangerous and wanted, that it warrants this kind of bullshit, top-secret enclave where they congregate? Elvenkind and fey -- must they be so dramatic?
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 02:19
Whoever wrote this letter sure did know a lot of names from a long dead past life of Nyr's. He reads the letter, taking in every word. Looking for any clue as to who wrote it, and what they really wanted. Nyr was always good at keeping his emotions in check. But the sight of these names had him in an outright panicked state. The Eladrin's breaths become eradic as his vision begins to blur. He can feel every single beat of his heart as if it were a war drum signaling the coming of an invading force. He steals himself and continues.....was this a prank? Strahd getting back at him for his flippant comments at tea time?
1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 30-08-2023 05:10
In this pouch you will find 4 dried blossoms of the Vor Thomil Nightshade, a deadly poison. I‚Äôve alchemically processed and leached out most of the toxin, but the result of ingestion will still likely kill you. As part of the ritual to pass into the pocket of Ar-Anqual√´,
Nyr frowns at this name, for it means near-death in Elvish.
you must find another ingredient of great vitality or great protective power to ingest along with it. This way, your body will go into a very still coma, but your soul, along with the spirit of whatever you can carry on your body and in your own two hands, will be projected into Ar-Anqual√´. It‚Äôs hard to say how long the effects will last, but I fear you may only have a day or two at most before you wake up. I have faith you will do what you know to be right.
Nyr absent-mindedly caresses the pouch he also received from Beory gently. Fingers trying to seek out a shape or a texture of what's contained therein.
PS - Four blossoms are enclosed; no telling whether you have friends faithful, or perhaps daring, or perhaps stupid enough to follow you down this road.‚Äù
Riannoc BOT 30-08-2023 07:15
An inaudible sneezing has occured somewhere in another part of the world just when Nyr chanced upon the word ‚Äústupid.‚Äù
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 12:20
Could this be it? After nearly a century, was it finally time to make them pay? He folds the paper back up, oblivious to the shadowy tendrils forcing themselves from his pores. Nyr had heard of the Vistani taking deadly plants to induce a coma like state, but had never seen it, nor did he know what to pair it with so they didn't die. "Dying would be counter-productive. Let's avoid that." He mumbles to himself "Three idiots to follow me into a near death induced state to take on an organization with far reaching evil machinations." He thinks to himself He ponders for a moment before reaching into his pack and pulling out a sending stone. Holding it up, he notices the shadows shaping off of him. "Oh yeah, there's that too" Catch up on Lars recruitment attempt here: https://discord.com/channels/905604470644285460/1079559700888162304/1144407718254354523
1
Lars BOT 30-08-2023 17:19
As the shadarkai, bruised and beaten from their sparring session, finished reading the letter, he folds it and returns the contents back to Nyr. - ... *He stares into your eyes for a long time. No doubt first trying to ascertain if this is some kind of prank, but you're no Ric. Maybe he's trying to gauge if this is an elaborate assassination attempt. So far two of his closests have traded blows with him, you making the third in a quite eventful week. Or perhaps he's wondering how to best say "no". After all, who in their right minds would follow clearly dangerous instructions from a mysterious person through a letter? Regarding deadly poisons, no less! Even Lars is smarter than tha--* - Who are the other two... *Gods be damned. He's gonna accept it. But not before a smirk curls up both sides of his mouth.* - ... Shadowlark? He's clearly mocking your edgy nickname.
1
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 18:10
"Nevermind, give me that." He quickly reaches to snatch the note from your hand "It was a given name.....not like i chose it...... it was a long time ago!" Hes scrambling for excuses "Not important! As for who else? Needs to be someone stupid. Got anyone in mind?"
Lars BOT 30-08-2023 18:28
- Ric, obviously. He answers in such a rapid-fire way that you might wonder why you even asked in the first place. - Maybe Lila, Georg? But perhaps those two are occupied with, uh... Other activities. There's Brog, he can be convinced. Finn too, Centuri will probably follow us if we ask - but she will have plenty of questions. He starts losing track of his train of thought. - Eledac would come if I asked. The Tallyman would be a pain in the ass, but maybe he'd like the idea too. There's also Javit, he wandered the mists before - what's another little near-death voyage? He starts counting people on his fingers. - The warforged twins, Stel, Fritz is on the run but he'd come... Moondrop, Scrihk, Trellum, Everlen... Wait, not those two. *He's gonna keep going if you let him. There's a lot of stupid people here.*
2
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 18:39
Nyr nods with each new name, trying to speak up and give his opinion but not being able to get you to stop long enough. "You should probably breath. Ric was obvious, but last I heard you two weren't seeing eye to eye" "Someone stupid, but also someone to keep us in line?"
Lars BOT 30-08-2023 21:49
- ... Korvin? He dismisses his own suggestion, waving his hand. - Probably better to ask Ric. He knows a lot more people than I do. Also... What's the other ingredient we're supposed to use? He suddenly remembers his bleeding hand and starts patching it up.
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 21:56
Nyr rumages through his pack and pulls out a handful of berries. "Here, this may take the edge off. Could you get a hold of not Ric? I have no way of contacting him"
Lars BOT 30-08-2023 21:59
*He picks the berries and smiles slightly. The memories rushing in from another day. Another age. Almost another life, it seems. He munches them while looking for another Sending Stone.* Riannoc. Drop everything you're doing and meet me in Vallaki as soon as you can - I might've found a way. He lowers the stone for a second, but returns it quickly to his face. ... and bring Keaghan! He then stores the item. - Alright, let's go.
1
1
Nyr BOT 30-08-2023 22:35
He and Lars walk side by side on their way to Vallaki. One recruit down, two to go. His feelings were mixed. There was a part of him that hoped this was all fake and he wouldn't have to face his past after all this time. He was still broke , but had made great steps to mend the wounds. Speaking of wounds "You, uh, should probably only eat one of those a day. You'll have extreme constipa...." He sees Lars munching on multiple berries, opps, too late "Nevermind...who's Keaghan?" Fade to Vallaki
Riannoc BOT 31-08-2023 07:23
*They would find it rested in front of the Blue Water Inn in Vallaki. A wagon, pulled by a shadow steed of black and purple manes. There she lays in solemn silence as daylight dawns over the somber town. The owner, a shadow elf of medium build can be found seated, reading a book on the extended porch. Morning dew has settled on his raven-feathered cloak, but not for long, as it all dries up by magic or some other means to twist the arcane.*

Avrae BOT 31-08-2023 07:24

Riannoc BOT 31-08-2023 07:28
Laying on his lap is a curious stone with raven symbolism engraved on it. It was still for one moment and it vibrates with the next. What magic, what devilry would be its purpose?
Riannoc BOT 31-08-2023 07:32
*From his iStone X the elf could hear the voice of his blood brother, urging him about the current meeting in Vallaki. Lifting the stone over to his left ear, he says in return:* "I'm in front of the inn. Can't miss it. Found a way for what?" He would ask, but he again forgets that two way reception only works once in Barovia. The service is that bad. Perhaps it's a good idea to invest in those paper birds, he thinks to himself.

Lars BOT 31-08-2023 13:21

May no one ever accuse Riannoc of deception ever again.* - I lied. Says the Shadarkai as soon as he's within earshot of his brother. - But I needed your attention for something, so there you go. Tell him, Nyr. He sidesteps and metaphorically throws the Eladrin to the fire. Better flex those persuasion skills!

Nyr BOT 31-08-2023 19:42
Nyr looks at Lars in disappointment. He had really hoped to know what Lars was talking about. Oh well. He turns to Riannoc, eyeing him suspiciously He still had no idea what happened to Ric. This was obviously not Ric, but he couldn't really understand what/why/how/who or when it all went wierd. "Riannoc, I'm not sure how much of Ric is still in there. Or if you're Ric or whatever. I'm dumb and don't understand. But I remember a good friend that took me under his wing my first night in Barovia, kept me company, and eased the transition to our prison here. He used to be a chronicler of people's stories. He knows my story already. Interested in seeing how it ends?"
Nyr BOT 31-08-2023 19:44
"And before you answer, I will add: Potentially death inducing substances are involved" He hands Riannoc the note
Riannoc BOT 31-08-2023 19:57
*The shadow elf before you has the same face of the first person who said hi the first night you came to this land. His serpentish eyes remains inquisitive like a hunter studying his prey. You'd expect your explanation would get you closer on friendly terms with him. Yet word by word you can easily sense his patience leaving his body by the second.* "Don't be daft, I know you, cousin. So good to see another person that holds Ric in a rather high regard. The fact that Lars and even you are being polite can only mean two possibilities. One, either you're about to blindside me and send me off to Castle Ravenloft, or two:

Riannoc BOT 31-08-2023 20:06
Regardless, he takes the note off your hands and begins reading. Eyes widening by the second. "Well... ain't this special" He raises a finger. "One, we travel to another plane.* Then a second finger. "Two, we find these villainous troublemakers." Three fingers now. "Three, we kill them there." Four fingers. "Four, we return." All five. "Five, we kill ourselves. I may have messed up the order but you know generally any plan does not begin with us killing ourselves." Before you even comment, he continues. "Indulge me, what manner of crime did they commit? I assume it's something so vile, so monstrous, perhaps unspeakable that you'd wish they're deader than dead?" <Gasps> "Are they the kind that puts three blocks of sugar before pouring their tea?" Nyr BOT 31-08-2023 23:11

He's fought alongside so many, and have lost so many. With the recent slew of demon attacks, it couldn't be too difficult to find someone dumb enough to join But, do they have the willpower to withstand the feafivethree?
Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 00:15
It‚Äôs around that point that a voice nearby can be heard: ‚ÄúExcuse me, would this be the caravan of‚Ä¶. Ricanoc?!‚Äù Everybody turns to see a young man with striking white hair stand only a few feet from the caravan. He furtively walked up to the vehicle without anyone noticing, alluding to his stealth prowess. Most would say he is handsome, and is currently wearing normal clothes, though one would see the bulges under the fabric, indicating he‚Äôs wearing some sort of armor underneath. There is a beautiful, intricate bow snapped to his back. He is currently looking at a small piece of paper. ‚ÄúRiac‚Ä¶ Rinacoc? Wow, she‚Äôs cute but her handwriting is absolute shit‚Ä¶.‚Äù he mumbles to himself, but loud enough for all to hear. He lifts his head. ‚ÄúIs there a Rinacoc here?‚Äù he asks, obvious uncertainty in his question.
Riannoc BOT 01-09-2023 00:28
"There isn't a Rinacoc here, but if you're here to make Riannoc murder himself you're succeeding." It would take a moment for the shadow elf to compose himself and manage a welcoming smile. After all, anyone could be a promising customer with the right coin. His greeting may be why he hasn't sold a pie yet for today, though. "What do you do now that you've found him, dear customer?"
Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 00:34
"Riannoc... Riannoc?" he repeats, looking back at the piece of paper. "This does not spell Riannoc however you read it... gotta teach her how to spell... whatever..." He walks up to the man who introduced himself as Riannoc. "My apologies for the mishap with your name, kind sir. I was sent here by dear friends of mine, Asahi and Yozuki. I assume you know them? I am experiencing a slight... disturbance, in my usual self, and was told that you may have something to remedy it." He stops and looks at Riannoc for any sort of reaction.
Riannoc BOT 01-09-2023 00:59
"...excuse me, you're friends with WHAT?" You'd know from his mixed reaction that this isn't any form of referrence. He takes a step back at the mention of a few names. "Those two... I don't know what they are, tried to excise a part of my- you know what, nevermind. If they're sending you to me, that means you're here for this." Resting on the shadow elf named Riannoc's palm is a small flask filled with light-brown liquid. "My blend of willow bark tea. And here I was thinking that it was for my charm or my good looks." (edited)
Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 01:09
Slightly taken aback by the reaction, he starts to wonder what may have happened between him and the twins, but at the sight of the small vials, his attention is redirected towards his problem. He frowns. "You... haven't heard what my issue is but you already know what I need? Just in case, let me explain and see if that is still the best remedy." "Where I'm from, I am what we call an Astral Wanderer. It allows me to control my dreams as if I was awake, though I am fully aware that I am in a dream. And I usually explore the cosmos, wandering from star to star, and meeting entities, learning from them." "It's actually how I got here to this shithole. I woke up from one of my explorations and found myself here in Barovia. So I was wondering if I could potentially get out the same way. But unfortunately, I've been unable to recreate the Astral Wandering effect while sleeping in this plane. It's like my mind is being trapped." "So I'm looking for something that would... release my mind and allow me to travel outside of this plane." "Just so we're clear; Astral Wandering is part of me. Being unable to do it is like missing a limb. It's a nightmare I can't wake up from. I'm willing to endure the worse you've got if it allows me to get out of here, even just mentally, for an extended period of time." "So... is that brown liquid still what I need?"

Lars BOT 01-09-2023 01:33

Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 01:38
Hearing the man besides him talk, he turns. So absorbed as he was by his issue and, more importantly, the hope of fixing it, he hadn't paid much heed to the other two people there. He recognizes the blueish figure he fought alongside with not too long ago. "Oh, Nyr, wasn't it? It's good to see you, I'm sorry for not greeting you properly. I'm also glad to know that the monstrosities didn't get you." He quickly glances at the third person present but does not recognize him. He still offers a small head movement to acknowledge his presence, then goes back to the conversation. Seeing as Riannoc was pondering things and seemingly not really knowing what to do, he speaks to Nyr. "I'm very interested in anything that could allow me to do what I want to do. Rain'noc seems to be trying to remember something, so in the meantime, I'm all ears." "What about Keaghan? Is he unavailable? No offense," he hears behind him from the third man. "None taken. After all, I have absolutely no idea what or who you're talking about. If it can help me, it could be Nyr, Keaghan, or Rinnaoc, I wouldn't mind." (edited)

Lars BOT 01-09-2023 02:25

Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 02:44
As Yuki takes the letter from Nyr, he looks at Lars with a raised eyebrow. This little elf's face shows little to no emotions, but he's very much on the sensitive side of the spectrum. Gotta be careful not to get him on your bad side, or you won't see the end of it for a while. There's still time to mend the situation. "I'm Yuki, nice to meet you. I'm still not quite sure what this is all about, my only concern when coming here was to hopefully get something that would allow me to Astral Wander again. The means aren't what I worry about. If you can be of assistance, I would be very happy to listen to your suggestions on the matter." He unfolds the letter as he speaks and starts reading. After a minute or two, he addresses Nyr: "So if I understand correctly, you will share one of these... blossoms... with me if I help you find the ingredient that would allow us not to die from it, and then these will allow all of us to travel to another dimension for you to... do something with these "Wisps". There are a lot of questions unanswered, but is that the gist of it?" (edited)
Riannoc BOT 01-09-2023 09:46
"Fantastic, you're all giving me aneurism.... ... It's a word. I learned that from the twins." This shadow elf shrugs, then whispers to the other, brooding one. "Keaghan's busy somewhere else, I'll let him know his lovely pecs and chiseled jawline are sorely missed." Then finally he gives his regards to this new companion before them. "I thought the creepies were full of it when they mentioned they met someone. You are indeed -pardon my Dwarvish- rather ballsy if that's still a criteria."
Lars BOT 01-09-2023 15:44
- How do we even find what these ingredients are? I did not wake up feeling Alchemical today. I woke up feeling Thieving... Thievery? Burglary. Rogueish. You get the point. He then sideways stare at Yuki again, with all of his stealthy approach. - Which will do me wonders, I'm sure of it. The elves present would recognize what he's talking about, although it's not hard to decipher. Some of the elvenkind have a sort of connection with their ancestors, able to recall new skills they didn't know previously. Seems like Lars brought the wrong set of tools today. (edited)
Riannoc BOT 01-09-2023 19:23
"'ingredient of great vitality or great protective power' it says..." He would think, or appear so doing for a while, before finally shrugging once more. "Not a clue. Some of my tea leaves are natural detoxifiers, but actual antitoxins? We're better off asking dear Bethel if she stocks any. Besides, I'm sure you've seen one like it in your occasional trips to the woods? Failing that..." Gulp... "...we'd have to ask someone, or something more knowledgeable about it."
Nyr BOT 01-09-2023 21:15

Vesperhale the Shadowmare [Riannoc] BOT 01-09-2023 21:33
She neighs in anticipation. With her pulling the wagon, travel does not seem to be much of a problem to them. Within reason
Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-09-2023 23:22
As no one is confirming nor denying his statement, Yuki assumes he hit the nail pretty dead on. He cocks his head to the side, thinking, uncertain of whether or not this is a good idea. It's not really what he had in mind, especially the near-death state implied, but it's the closest he's ever been to the sensation he's after. "I guess I'll tag along for now and see how it develops. If it gets too far from my comfort zone, I'll rethink my involvement. Can't Astral Wander if you're dead, after all..." He turns to Nyr as he gives him the paper back. "This letter is addressed to you. I assume that, between all of us, you should be the one who knows best how to tackle this. Where do we start?" (edited)
1
Riannoc BOT 02-09-2023 22:36
"Huh.... wait.... I remember something." He sits down on the extended porch of this wagon, one hand on his chin. The other hand does a fingersnap as the minified image of a crone comes standing on the nearby table. <Spell: Minor Illusion> "This hag... Bon-Hwa..." A side glance to Lars' direction all of a sudden. After all, the two of them had quite the history between them regarding this particular hag of the swamps. "She sent me through a similar journey before... to the Feywilds, one that I know of anyway. I can't say for sure how much of that was a reality, but I can say I met someone that... I couldn't possibly meet in this living, breathing world." https://discord.com/channels/905604470644285460/960589746642509954/1114573318939476018 Another fingersnap, then the illusion shifts to show the towering, colourful floral life of the Feywilds, one which any who graced its grounds would feel some sort of familiarity with. "You all think she might be so generous to give us a clue?"
Nyr BOT 03-09-2023 01:29
His knees buckle slightly at the sight of his beloved home. It feels like it's been centuries since he last set foot in the verdant green plane of mischief. But that was a life time ago, and Nyr was no longer the naive Eladrin that left that place. "I highly doubt a hag would be so generous. Ive never had dealings with it before, but if it's like any of the other hags I've dealt with....taking the poison straight would be the better deal." (edited)
Yuki Northernfur BOT 03-09-2023 01:46
"Well, we'll have to start somewhere, so how about we go and try our luck somewhere more... neutral. The library burnt down, but there might be some vestige left. We could start there while we keep thinking of people to ask?" "If we're lucky, the librarians already started recuperating and transcribing the books that could be saved, and if we're very lucky, something might give us a hint." "As far as I'm concerned, the only person I know that is versed in the art of alchemy is Schrick. Kind of talking and walking rat of sorts. He seemed to have a bunch of potions and whatnot, so maybe he'd know something... but that's about it, and I have no clue where he is right now." "If you would like to suggest other people, great, but if we're already out of names, the library, or what is left of it, might be our best starting point." "Any thoughts?"
Nyr BOT 03-09-2023 01:58
"Never been the the library. I prefer being chased by wolves in the wilds over being stuck around 'smart' people" Nyr does in fact roll his eyes and use air quotes when he says "smart people" "But, it being burned to the ground may work in our favor. Let's give it a shot. If we don't get what we want, we will go to the Vistani and demand answers"
Yuki Northernfur BOT 03-09-2023 02:03
Yuki turns to Lars. He hadn't said much until now, but that didn't mean he had nothing to say. It would be polite to include him in the conversation. "You may have your own idea on the subject. Would you like to share your thoughts?"
Riannoc BOT 03-09-2023 10:34
‚ÄúOh I assure you, I was terribly scarred when the librarium went down, and with it my back up journal regarding all the people I met in Barovia.‚Äù A distressed vein is showing on the surface of his hands. The elf is clenching hard, he is holding his fury at bay with his words. ‚ÄúDoubt there‚Äôs anything left from the rubbles.‚Äù
1
Nyr BOT 03-09-2023 15:49
"Well then, that settles it! Straight to the source we go. With any luck maybe we can dig up who sent this letter in the first place." He looks at each of you with gratefulness in his eyes. If you look deeper there is a sense of pity in there as well. Pity for everyone but especially for himself. He wasn't sure he was ready to face these demons yet. But fate doesn't wait for the prepared. "I don't know what we will be getting in to. These are some bad people we're dealing with. It's going to be dangerous. DM [CreamPuff] BOT 03-09-2023 20:34
As the party returns to the Vistani camp outside of Vallaki, Beory is busy describing the properties of infernal steel to an elf with ashen skin. Not quite the same type of grey as the shadar Kai among you, but similar.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 03-09-2023 20:35

Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 03-09-2023 20:37

Lars BOT 03-09-2023 21:18
*He had something to say about Bon Hwa, also about the library and it's dangerous "librarians", he also had a suggestion or two of people they could ask, and even on the topic of the ratfolk alchemist... Lars had a few words. But Gods be damned if he couldn't concentrate at all right now. This freaking Yuki wore the most white hair one could wear. How was it possible? It was blindingly bright, ugh! As they travelled onwards to Beory, Lars stayed on the back of the wagon. He smoked a pipe most of the way, killing time. When they reached the vendor, he let his friends take care of the asking and instead got enthralled by the mystery of this ash-skinned elf. Didn't seem Shadarkai, but the recent amount of siblings Lars found on Barovia made him kind of expect more and more to come. He keeps his eye on the figure, waiting to catch a glimpse of their face.* (edited)

Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 03-09-2023 23:24

Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 04-09-2023 21:33
The ashen elf notices Nyr's approach and gives a slight nod indicating his recognition but does not otherwise say much.
Riannoc BOT 04-09-2023 22:31

In response to Beory's jolly demeanor, Riannoc comes down from his driver seat and approaches the dwarf with a bow. Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 04-09-2023 23:28

"Unfortunately, that's not really the type of goods I specialize in. Equipment, scrolls, minerals -- my travelers know that's the type of stuff I carry. Ingredients and such can be quite perishable, so I don't import that stuff."
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 04-09-2023 23:29

Riannoc BOT 05-09-2023 00:28

Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 05-09-2023 00:37
The elf smiles. The smile does not quite reach his sad, clear eyes. "A hearty meal of great import it must be then, if you're willing to pay Beory's prices... hehe. No offense, old friend." "I am Kasimir of the dusk elves. We live among the Vistani here on the outskirts of Vallaki."
Yuki Northernfur BOT 05-09-2023 01:01
Yuki chimes in. He speaks in a positive tone devoid of any hidden meaning. "Dusk elves. I can't say that I have heard of dusk elves before. I'm sure you have a fascinating history and I am interested in learning more about our allies in this realm, but it'll have to wait for another day." "Before we get into further details as to what purpose the item we're looking for will serve, may I ask whether you are verse in the world of alchemy? If not, we would all save some time to simply be directed to someone who is." "But if you are, we could potentially be very interested customers. Would you have credentials or connections in this matter, Kasimir of the Dusk Elves?"
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 05-09-2023 01:22
Kasimir doesn't look offended in the least at Yuki's pragmaticism. He continues smiling a quiet smile as Yuki finishes, and replies, "I wouldn't call myself an alchemical genius by any means, but my people have been in this valley for a very long time -- since the beginning of the Count's reign." He clears his throat. "Perhaps what I lack in knowledge about alchemy, I can make up for in naturalist knowledge of the valley, if it interests you."
Yuki Northernfur BOT 05-09-2023 02:06
Yuki checks him up and down a little, looking at signs of deception, but he seems to be confident in his claim. He gives a little nod. He then turns to Nyr and slightly raises both shoulders and hands palms up, indicating he was also at the impass of not knowing whether or not they should open to the stranger. "It could be worth asking, but that's not on me to decide. Your letter, your choice, but as far as I know, comparing an alchemist and a naturalist is like comparing a sorcerer and a wizard; they both do very similar things but the source of their stuff or how they learn it and prepare it is a bit different. I might be wrong though, I'm just parroting what I was told." "He seems confident to me, if that counts for anything."
Lars BOT 05-09-2023 02:19
*While inspecting the man called Kasimir, Ric and Yuki start to play their parts and ask questions. Some of them quite good. The Dusk Elves. And now found here in the valley. It adds up, it seems Strahd's hunger for new subjects trace back to the very beginning. Lars doesn't say anything, but instead allows time for his allies to work their silver-tongued magic.*
1
Nyr BOT 05-09-2023 20:00
After a few moments Nyr approaches Beory and greets him with a bow. "Thank you for your time. Before I direct my questions to Kasimir here, I would have one more ask for you." "Due to the nature of the late you deliver to me, it would be helpful and appreciated if we could talk to the person who gave it to you" He gives Beory a sincere look of gratitude, knowing that the merchant was highly unlikely to give up his sources
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 05-09-2023 20:20
"Ah, I'm sorry, sir Nyr. She has already headed out on the next trade route! You know us Vistani -- those who love to wander find it hard to sit still for too long!" "Rest assured, my friend, that even if she were here to answer your questions, she would not be able to tell you who paid her. She said it was a cloaked figure who came up to her at a market in the Feywild. Asked for discretion and paid a handsome fee for the letter delivery. If anything, they were probably in a disguise as well -- you know how nothing in the Feywild is as it seems." The dwarf says apologetically.
Nyr BOT 05-09-2023 21:29
The Eladrin smiles at Beory and gives a slight nod of his head "No worries my dear Beory. I had assumed as much, but wanted to try my luck anyway. Thank you for your time." Nyr turns to Kasimir, intersecting himself into the conversation. There's an impatience in him that's growing. Better to get moving before he loses his nerve to face these demons "Kasimir, my good sir, I hope you are well. What we are seeking is an ingredient of unknown name or origin. Something to help neutralize the death part of consuming the Vor Thormil Nightshade." (edited)
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 05-09-2023 21:57
He nods his head solemnly. "I do not know the exactly poison that you have named, Nyr, but I can tell you about a couple ingredients our people have depended on in the past to nourish ourselves when we fall to a grave sickness, or a power antitoxin against a poison that was ingested or inhaled." "First, have you heard of a gigantic bird called a Roc? They are quite rare, and extremely dangerous, but they exist here in the valley." "For those who fall gravely ill among my tribe, there is a rite of honor an elf may undertake... To seek out the nest of a roc and recover their giant egg. These eggs are known to contain incredible nourishment. Consuming it will bolster your mortal bodies with great fortitude. It has been many years since one of us has undertaken such an endeavor, as the risk is high and I simply can't afford to lose more members of our tribe." "If this be your wish, I am happy to share the last known location of a roc with you that our scouts have discovered. Note that their breeding is also infrequent, so you might be rolling the dice here with what you might find." He pauses. "Any questions, my friend, before I tell you about another possible ingredient that may aid you?"
Nyr BOT 05-09-2023 22:02
You can see the corner of Nyrs lips curl up at the thought. "Hmm. A Roc you say? That could be fun. Oak Father knows I could use the challenge to clear my head. But, I'm all for options. What is the other ingredient?"
Riannoc BOT 05-09-2023 22:07
"A gigantic bird that may very well kill us even before we imbibe the poison. Wonderful." So he thought. Oh yes, what else were you expecting, Riannoc? Were you hoping for blue cheese fished from the river? "Please tell me it's blue cheese fished from the river." (edited)
1
Nyr BOT 05-09-2023 23:05
"There's no way it's blue cheese fished from the river" Nyr says with an eye roll almost cutting Rinonca off. "...right?"
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 06-09-2023 01:10
For the first time, you see Kasimir actually laugh and break out of the stoic smile he has habitually plastered to his face. "No... it is not blue cheese fished from the river. Although I'm quite intrigued now. I suppose I'll have to find my fishing rod which I haven't touched in two centuries." "The other possible ingredient I might suggest is something I discovered some years ago, as I was hiking around the slopes of Mt. Ghakis. I frequent that part of the wilds quite a bit, and one of these trips, I slipped on a particularly icy cliff face and fell into a small cave that was covered and hidden by a thick layer of powdered snow." He continues, as if describing something as mundane as bartering for fresh eggs at the market. "After I woke up from passing out from the pain and set my ankle sprain, it was already after nightfall, but the cave was illuminated from within -- I was pleasantly surprised to find a small colony of luminescent mushrooms -- all semi-translucent like glass, or dew drops, and shimmering with light." "They were cold to the touch, and I marveled at this fungal variety that can grow out of the snow itself, and I harvested a few to bring back to the camp. We have found that it is quite powerful at cleansing and counteracting poisons -- whether they be from snakes, plants, or magic."
Nyr BOT 06-09-2023 01:24
Well that settles it then. We split up, half of us get the Roc egg, the other half find these glowy ice shrooms." "Meet back here tomorrow and we'll make a life saving omlette" (edited)
1
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 06-09-2023 01:35
The dusk elf chuckles. "Very ambitious. The poison you're trying to cure or protect from must be truly extraordinary. I would normally guess that one out of the two ingredients I named would be enough for the vast majority of poisons in the world -- at least, enough to stop you from dying."
Yuki Northernfur BOT 06-09-2023 01:35
Yuki listens to the conversation in silence, his elbows propped on the railing and his head resting on his hand. On the one hand, they could go and try to steal an egg from a rare bird, which would most likely be extremely pissed about it. And his shifter mind is not keen towards essentially killing the progenity of a rare specie, however dangerous and monstrous it is. He doesn't know what the cheese tangent was about, but he's glad it isn't a thing because blue cheese is disgusting and one that rested in the river for a long period of time sounds horrendous beyond belief. He'd rather make the Rocs go extinct. Then on the other hand, there's the cave option. It seems safer, in a way, but there's no such thing as a safe option in Barovia, that he knows by now. He's actually quite impressed the elf made it out alive, injured on top of it. He's about to ask a few questions when Nyr proposes the most ridiculous plan he's heard. "You want to split a team of four? Make duos? Are you insane? Our chances of survival are already extremely low on a daily basis, and now you want to actively go into monsters' lairs with half your fighting power? Nah, we're just halfing our chances in the process. Let's talk about the cave instead." He addresses Kasimir. "That cave you mentioned. There are a few things I would like to ask about it if you don't mind." "First, how far is it? Do you remember where it is, and could you point it on a map?" "Second, from your experiments, how many mushrooms would we need to counter the poison that at most four people would ingest at the same time? Are there enough?" "Third, did you see any hint that the cave was inhabited by... anything? Bedding, bones, blood, fur, claw marks, any of the sort? In or around the cave?" "And lastly, do you think the cave has another entry point? Did it look like it continued further in the mountain?" "I know this is a lot, but I like to... plan. Efficiently." (edited)

Riannoc BOT 06-09-2023 07:24

Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 06-09-2023 10:52
"I like a man who gets right to the point," Kasimir laughs at the drastic contrast between Yuki and the rest of the crew. "Very well. Thanks to Nyr's previous contributions to my tribe, I am happy to share this information with you." "The scouts reported that on the mountain pass to the west of Mount Ghakis, a giant roc was seen nesting above it. It is quite steep, and the weather conditions can be dire, I hope you will be prepared to go into its territory. It is already fiercely territorial, and if it has an egg in its nest, then it will be doubly so." "Sadly I don't have a map to share with you, for that is one of the ways to draw the Count's ire, and my people have been in these lands for long enough that we don't really use maps, but you should head a few hours west of Vallaki. When you come to a split in the road, where a path goes north and you might be able to see a strange tower in the middle of Lake Baratok, don't turn off and continue onward. You should soon come to a split off to the south -- do take that road and it will wind its way up the slopes toward Mt. Ghakis." "If you decide to circumvent the Roc's territory -- you're already in the perfect spot to go mushroom hunting." He chuckles. "I don't think you need to go back to the exact cave where I was, but it's a few hours farther along the road to the peak of Ghakis." "I remember I was on the western slopes, shortly after crossing the bridge over the Luna River -- right where it first pours out from Luna Lake. The hills are steep and the snow makes it treacherous. And the temperatures up there are unholy -- even in the summer. Make sure you are well prepared to deal with the cold."
Riannoc BOT 06-09-2023 19:49
"Am I glad Ric didn't finish making his map" "There are worse ways to die than cold, I guess." But we all know who's going to be first to complain when the temperature drops even just slightly lower than his pompousness.

Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 06-09-2023 22:55

Riannoc BOT 06-09-2023 23:58

Yuki Northernfur BOT 07-09-2023 00:10
Yuki listens and watches the conversation deviate from the points he asked. He feels like that'll be something to get used to. Cold doesn't really faze him. He quickly looks in his backpack to see what he brought. The charm is there, but a ring could help. He can tolerate very cold weather, but why have to tolerate it when you can make it go away? While keeping an ear on the back and forth between sellers and buyers, Yuki asks Kasimir: "Thank you for sharing this information with us, we greatly appreciate it. West of Vallaki for a few hours, get to a fork, ignore the tower to the north, keep going west, get to another fork, head south from there and get to Mt. Ghakis. Circumvent the Roc territory and start mushroom hunting, trying to head towards the western slope near the bridge over Luna river. Mentally noted." Riannoc BOT 07-09-2023 00:17
*He was going to suggest ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs pick them all!‚Äù, but knowing the current company he‚Äôs in, the elf finds it wise to just stay still and be silent. There are many dumb ways to die in Barovia.*
Lars BOT 07-09-2023 00:24

Nyr BOT 07-09-2023 01:24

Yuki Northernfur BOT 07-09-2023 01:29
"You're assuming they grow in large patches. But if they are rare and far appart, we might not have the luxury to pick them all. Hence why I asked. If they were so common as to make the quantity irrelevant, then I'm not even sure why we would bother with a Roc. Might as well just have a stroll and pick all the mushrooms. In which case, I would also expect them to be readily available for purchase as well. But they aren't, so I assumed they were pretty rare and difficult to get," he explains, trying to make sense of why he believes quantity is important. Knowing when to stop looking for something is a good way to save time and exhaustion. (edited)
Lars BOT 07-09-2023 01:32
- Ah, so that's why. He nods, genuinely convinced.
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 01:38
Kasimir watches quietly with an amused smile, before finally answering, "The mushrooms are quite potent. You don't relaly need to eat more than one per person for that period you need to fight against the toxins. Last I saw, the patches were fairly small -- a good 7 or 8 mushrooms in that cave alone. I say that you may not be able to find the exact cave because I don't really remember where it is. Just be patient and test some snow banks until one ends up being a cave -- or wait for them to glow when it's dark in the night!"
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 01:44
"Well, well, well -- if you purchase this," Beory takes out a small lead box and opens it. Sitting inside are a few dark cubes made out of stone, glowing slightly like ember. As soon as the box lid is open you feel an unbearable heat rush out from it and you begin to sweat. "These are thermal cubes made of brimstone! They are only 50 gold pieces each, and if you carry it with you, everything within a 15 foot radius will feel like you're traversing a desert." He closes the lid and chuckles. "Quite an economical option, although you would have to stand near whoever owns it." "The other option are these," He takes out a small satin pouch and takes out a ring from within. Surprisingly, the band is made out of wood. The inside of the ring is covered in a lining of white fur -- looking suspiciously like Yuki's hair. Atop the wooden ring there's a carved snowstone motif of two white foxes snuggling together in a circular design. "These rings are hand crafted by the best artisans -- if you focus your mind and attune to their magic, you and the objects you carry upon your body will be able to withstand the harshest of temperatures the middle planes can throw at you, down to negative 50 degrees!"
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 01:44
Kasimir silently raises his hand up to show you that he wears one upon his left pinky.
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 01:47
"Normally, I'd charge ya 480 gold pieces for each, but I'll make you a deal: bring me back one of the roc's talons, and I'll let you have them for half the cost. Or consider a free rental for the four of you to go up to the mountain!" (edited)
Nyr BOT 07-09-2023 01:55
"Beory please don't take this the wrong way, but you're a business man... what's in it for you if we borrow these rings?"
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 02:09
"Well... see it as an investment. I'm hoping that by keeping you guys not frozen to death, you can either bring me back the talon of a Roc -- which will be a very valuable item for me to trade away, or maybe some of those powerful mushrooms that Kasimir has piqued my interest with -- however many you don't end up needing, of course."
Riannoc BOT 07-09-2023 06:05
‚Äú‚ÄòLike desert‚Äô is a bit much, you lovable oaf. Nevertheless, you have yourself a deal, at least for me.‚Äù He reaches to Beory‚Äôs hand, shaking it while a shadow hand picks up one of the thermal cubes and another places a pouch of 50 gold on the table.
1
Lars BOT 07-09-2023 09:06

Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 09:16
"The rest of you lot sure you don't need a ring? These babies also seem to make ice-based magics and even a silver dragon's breath less effective on you..." Oh Beory -- ever the silver-tongued salesman. "I'll loan them to ya free of charge, as long as you bring me back something worth trading!"
Yuki Northernfur BOT 07-09-2023 13:36
"The offer for the ring is very tempting, as they would provide the most freedom of movement. They would also be free of charge in exchange for the talon of a roc or some mushrooms." "However, I believe that, as you said, focusing our minds and attuning to them would be a bit much for adventurers who are already attuned to many different things. Moreover, one thermal cube each would allow us similar freedom of movement, and wouldn't have us go out of our way to kill something we don't need, or spend precious time searching the snow beyond what we require." "It is a generous offer, don't get me wrong, we greatly appreciate it and may have taken you up on it in a different situation, but as I see things right now, I'll also take a stone and content myself with it." He says all that out loud to illustrate his point of view to his comrades while taking out 50 gold pieces to give the merchant in exchange for a Thermal Cube.

Nyr BOT 07-09-2023 20:29

Riannoc BOT 07-09-2023 21:09
"Ahem... hypothetical questions, surely"
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 21:51
The dwarf and the elf exchange a glance with each other.
Kasimir [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 21:54
"No special preparation. Just eat it. Note that the texture can be quite crunchy... Like ice."
Beory [CreamPuff] BOT 07-09-2023 21:56
"Well, if you hypothetically we're going to go on an out of body journey, I would assume you'd want to find a place that's safe for your bodies... As safe as things can be in Barovia I suppose." "Maybe a friend or two to guard over you while you're unconscious... We call them sitters, hehe, when we partake in substances whose effects are unpredictable."

Nyr BOT 07-09-2023 23:29

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 09-09-2023 10:50
At that, the party departs the Vistani camp and begins heading westward from Vallaki. After some 4 hours of traveling, the party comes to a three-way split, where the northern route is a dirt path that climbs slightly uphill toward Lake Baratok, the southern route leads into the swamps, and the westward route is the flat, path that adventurers are accostomed to taking when they need to make the rare trip out to Krezk. Following Kasimir's verbal directions, the party continues to head west another three hours until the last light of day fades from behind the clouds and they need to decide whether to push on or to make camp. *However, Yuki suddenly raises up a hand to stop the party's progress as he sees two figures, both on horseback, barely illuminated by a small tinge of twilight, seemingly in the middle of a heated discussion in the middle of the road some 200 feet away. The party is yet too far to hear any of the content of what's being said, but Yuki's sharp eyes would make out that one of the figures is a genteel looking woman wearing fine clothes and a beautiful cape, with long dark hair. Her face isn't visible as her back is turned to the party, but the horse she rides upon is pure black, and where it should have a flowing mane is instead replaced by flames coming off of the horse's body, although they do not seem to be scorching the rider. The other rider is clad head to toe in heavy plate armor -- face fully enclosed in a helmet. Wisps of orange flames also seem to drift off of his armor as well before dissipating in the air. His stance upon the top of his horse -- a heavy, muscular war horse wreathed in purple energies -- is much more aggressive. He has an unsheathed longsword in one hand and it is pointed straight out toward the woman.*
Yuki Northernfur BOT 09-09-2023 12:07
Yuki closes the little distance he has with his companions to communicate with them in a low voice. "Potential trouble ahead. Two riders, one female, the other unknown. The female is on a pitch-black horse with flaming mane, dressed elegantly. The other is in full plate armor on a warhorse and seemingly threatening the woman with his sword." "We can rush ahead and barge in the altercation. We can avoid contact and get off the road here for the night, and just pretend we haven't seen anything. I can go ahead and try to sneakily see and hear what's going on, and contact one of you from over there using this," he shows a blueish earring on his right ear, "or we could just continue nonchalantly on our way and try to... just walk past." "Any other suggestion is welcome, but in almost all of these scenarios, we should act quick."

They're probably adventurers, and seem capable to deal with their problems on their own. I can make us invisible and we just keep going, but we'd have to leave the cart behind.

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 09-09-2023 22:08
As the party debates, those who have been watching the figures would see that the armored one with an outstretched sword rears up his horse and stomps on the ground, releasing a massive shockwave that bursts out from him - the thunderous noise reaches the party a moment later as it sounds like a massive explosion. The lady on horseback is shoved back a few feet, her horse with the fiery mane whinnies but doesn't panic. She stretches out her hand and retaliates by sending out a thick bolt of blinding lightning directly into the armored knight.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 10-09-2023 01:29
Keeping an eye on the two figures, Yuki speaks again, this time with a bit more hurry in his voice. "Things are escalating. If we don't act now, we could lose the opportunity to go through this path for a while." "Also. Just so we're all on the same page, I only offered options that would seem... palatable to most people. There are darker ways around this." "We could, for example, wait for one of them to kill the other, and jump the victor while they are weakened, and reap the spoils of victory. No witnesses left alive, and a possible great gain for us." Yuki looks at everyone attentively as he finishes, trying to see if he ignited something in them, gauging the kind of people he's with. She seems to be effortlessly deflecting the strikes with nothing more than her riding whip, occasionally striking back with a crack of the whip against the armored man's heck, arm, and other small openings in his armor.

Yuki Northernfur BOT 10-09-2023 14:59

"A fight of that scale, using magic, can span hundreds of feet, I'm not sure that..." But the caravan is already in movement, making its way towards the strangers. He frowns. "Ok then, but not too close, and let's not disturb them. A moment's distraction can cost the lives of fighters such as these." As he looks upon the combat, Yuki unsnaps the intricate, elegant bow from his back and holds it in his hands. Just in case. (edited)
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 10-09-2023 20:52
*As the party chooses caution over excitement, they would see that the armored knight conjures a ball of dark, chaotic energy in his hand, launching it toward the woman who simply waves a hand of her own and countering the magic into non-existence. The woman then launches a fireball at the knight, completely incinerating the warhorse to cinders. The knight does not give up and charges the woman on foot with his sword, and over the next half-minute they trade blows until the woman leaps off of her horse, practically flying, striking out with a gleaming tip to her whip that sinks deep into the helmet's small opening and the helmet bursts with lightning. The entire suit of armor sizzles with smoke until it collapses to the floor. The woman calmly walks back to her horse and leaps up gracefully to remount. Her defeated foe begins to disintegrate into a fine black dust at her feet and she begins riding off westward.*
Nyr BOT 10-09-2023 23:02
"Well then, thay was entertaining. I hope she's on our side." He stretches and let's out a yawn "Shakl we find a place to make camp, or do we follow after?"

Yuki Northernfur BOT 11-09-2023 00:30

Lars BOT 11-09-2023 01:54

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 11-09-2023 05:28
As Lars begrudgingly watch the mysterious woman's silhouette fade away along with the last of the daylight, the party finds a clearing where Riannoc can safely park his wagon for the night. A campfire was made and rations shared until it was time for those who sleep to take their slumber, and those that trance enter their communion. Nyr, having taken first watch, takes a moment to sort through his feelings about this whole ordeal. Is he right to trust the words of an unknown stranger? Is it wise to imbibe something that he has no idea the true properties about? And to drag some friends into it? What if this whole thing was a ploy to assassinate him? But then again, how did this person know about him? If the Wisps wanted him dead, they probably have other methods; plus, in their arrogance, they probably don't think of Nyr as much of a threat at all. As these thoughts swirl around in his head like a blizzard, some 60 minutes into everyone settling down for bed, he hears from deeper within the woods a loud cracking -- like something very sturdy splintering. His hearing is for some reason perfectly crisp at this point in the night and he can almost visualize this as the noise continues: it sounds like a tree's roots being torn out of the earth. As he concentrates, Nyr would also hear a strange, low murmur... a grunt? No, it's melodic. A strange tune being hummed by a low, masculine voice. As he trains his eyes into the treeline, he can't see much yet, aside from a swirling of lights dancing around -- a clear sign of magic, although he can't yet decipher what.
Nyr BOT 11-09-2023 09:35
The party settled in for the night. He knew Lars was disappointed, but there was just too much at stake to get distracted. No matter how tempting that distraction may be. Once all the others were into their sleep, or trance, he would let out a sigh and relax just a bit. He had been so tense the past couple days. Rightfully so. Out of his pouch he pulls out a chalice and places it on a flat rock in front of him. He then takes out various sprigs of herbs and berries and places them inside the chalice. He sits there and mutters under his breath in Sylvan: "Breach the mist barrier and join me, darling. The fey realm can stand to suffer your absence for a little while" A green swirl of smoke begins to twist and dance out of the chalice before dissipating into the night air. A moment later, the familiar sight of the owl Mia soars out of the tree line. Her flight is graceful, her eyes always glowing with a slight blue tint. She lands on the same rock the chalice is on and looks at Nyr expectantly "I hope I didn't interrupt anything important." He asks as he gently places the chalice and other reagents back into his pouch. Mia let's out a small "hoot" in responce. "I'm sure you know what's going on. I want you to know that I will do my best to not tarnish your memory. They all deserve to die...but you wouldnt want it that way would you?" "hoot" "Not very talkative tonight are we? Fair enough." A slight pause "It's crazy how they found me, right? Probably a trap. But why now? It was so long ago. And what more can they do to me? They've already taken my will to live....death would be a blessing." "hoot" "Sorry. Thinking out loud. Sometimes it helps to tell you my thoughts even though you can't help. Maybe I'm going insane? Probably." "hoot" "I promise to try to keep the shadows at bay....I know that side of the fey realm isn't what we stood for. It could be useful though, just give it a chance, okay?" "hoot" (edited)

Yuki Northernfur BOT 12-09-2023 00:21
Yuki is woken up by Nyr's call. He hadn't been quite asleep when he was torn out of it. This fleeting moment where reality and dream merge and you're on the cusp of falling into slumber. Being robbed of that sensation is even worse than being woken up from actual sleep. So he's a little frustrated right now. He likes his shut-eye undisturbed. He tries to shift his annoyance from Nyr to whatever it is that had made him shout out. "What are we looking at?" he asks in a low, grumpy voice as he stands, picking up his bow.

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 12-09-2023 00:38
The humming Nyr heard draws nearer and the melody seems to crescendo in volume and accelerate in frantic rhythm. In the darkness of the treeline, you would see an old man, bent over with age, holding a strange lantern emitting a green glow at the end of a gnarly stick. His hair is long and knotted and messy, and his robes look very unwashed and patched up in many places with a variety of harvest fibers and bark. The two trees seem to be following him, lumbering forward.
Nyr BOT 12-09-2023 02:00

Riannoc BOT 12-09-2023 13:58
Oh fuck, here comes trouble. He rolls his eyes slightly then raises his hands up high in the air where the old man can see them. "Ahem. Pardon, we weren't aware this is your forest nor that we are endangering it, friend. We'll do away with the fire shortly." He blows a breath towards the campfire, which immediately extinguishes itself as if it was never lit. Subtle spell: Prestidigitation. "We- I am sorry for harming your forest, but we need a place to stay the night even without the fire. Do we have your permission to just stay on the wagon- that is, our mobile abode there and leave first thing in the morning?" *If anything, he felt lucky for purchasing that heat stone from Beory. The chill of the night shall bother them not even without campfire. Provided all five of them, Ves included, stay very close to each other, that is.*

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 12-09-2023 19:38

"Why'd you go and cut down perfectly happy trees to turn them into this ugly monstrosity. Bleh!" He crinkles his entire face like a child who tasted lemon for the first time. "And the audacity... to bind the corpses of my beloved trees together with metal brackets and nails. bleh!!! Sinner!" When Nyr mentions that the sticks are already dead, he scowls at the eladrin. "What do you know about sticks!!" The old man barks. "Just because it's dead doesn't mean it's yours for the taking!! How would you like it if your loved one died and a necromage comes along and uses their body because they're already dead??" He looks at Nyr with wide, bloodshot eyes, as if he had just made the best point in the history of rhetoric and debate. "Plus, the sticks rot into the ground... food for the other trees!!"

Riannoc BOT 12-09-2023 20:40

Answer: The wagon. The wagon grows a face and now talks, making minimal movement and not more than necessary. The windows as eyes, the sidedoor as mouth... use your imagination for the rest. It even produces the rickety sounds befitting of old wood. Such trickery is out of common sense, but hey, this old man does not seem like he has plenty of it to begin with. Subtle spell: Major Image, investigation DC 19* (edited)
Lars BOT 12-09-2023 22:46
*Suddenly Lars opens his eye. Just singular, just the right one. He didn't much mind the raving lunatic screaming insanities, he was sure his allies could handle that problem themselves. Yuki Northernfur BOT 14-09-2023 00:12
Yuki is starting to get antsy. He's controlling his annoyance (which is rapidly building up to anger), because he understands that talking their way out of a situation is almost always better than fighting through it. And Riannoc is doing a pretty good job at reasoning with the unreasonable. That being said, that crazy old shitface is starting to step over lines. When you ask for tributes, there are things you can ask for, and things you can't ask for. Things that are ok include money, personal belongings, favors, information, those kinds of things. But among the things that are not ok, one can find: children (dead or alive), murder of innocents, defamation of landscape or nature, and pets. The old coot is not getting the horse. Period.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-09-2023 03:57

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-09-2023 04:04

Lars BOT 14-09-2023 04:08

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-09-2023 04:29

Lars BOT 14-09-2023 05:47
*He again searches his Brother's eyes. He also tried to reach Nyr's with his stare. Yuki is still a stranger to Lars' subtle expressions, in fact one might argue he didn't change his deadpan look at all. But the elven know. He's telling them to prepare themselves for a fight.*
Yuki Northernfur BOT 14-09-2023 05:54
As the conversation is getting away from his companions, Yuki has an idea. Whether or not it will work is anyone‚Äôs guess, but at least it‚Äôs worth a try. The man thinks they smell like city-dwellers? Let‚Äôs see how this will change his mind. A soft, barely perceptible breeze starts to blow. It is cold, though not freezing by any means. No one would notice it unless told it was there. As it surrounds and envelops Yuki, his pure-white hair starts to grow. Not just on his head, but on his face, neck, shoulders; mostly everywhere. His nose elongates into a black snout, his teeth grow pointier, his now-triangular ears move up on his head, and black lines surround his pale blue eyes. Last but not least, a tail of pure white, as fluffy as one can think fluffy could get, pops out of his pants. In his arctic fox form, Yuki can choose to walk on two legs or on four, but he chooses the former as he approaches the druid. While he walks, tiny white specks are briefly left in the air behind him, dancing in the wind; minuscule snowflakes soon to disappear in the warm night. Under his feet, small patches of ice are created where he sets foot, which evaporate after a few seconds. For anyone who has yet to see this form, it is quite breathtaking in its grace and majesty. ‚ÄúCity-smelling?‚Äù he repeats, his voice half growling, towering the druid, ‚ÄúI have been as free as any denizen of your forest, and sleeping outside for as long as I remember. I can sleep on a patch of snow in the middle of the winter. I can remember the landscape of every forest I have been in, have saved every plant or animal I could since I was born, and between you and I, you look more like the odd one out of the bunch.‚Äù ‚ÄúI dwell in the forest and the mountains, have always done so, and I vouch for my companions. Let us sleep here, and we‚Äôll be gone at first light. And as we do, we will endeavor to respect the area, and protect it from others much more ill-mannered than us." (edited)

Back home I hermited myself away into the forests of the feywild for a good century." He let's out a sigh "I do go to town about once a month. But have you seen Bethel's deals? Beory? Too good to pass up. I'll take city smelling for a good deal."

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-09-2023 23:09

"Take one and chew it up and eat it down, thank me later." He says expectantly.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 15-09-2023 07:47

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 15-09-2023 07:50

Yuki Northernfur BOT 15-09-2023 08:05

We wouldn't want to keep you. As you said, you have so many more trees to... awaken." Yuki's demeanor and gestures are meant to look gentle, but indicate that it is time for the druid to leave now.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 15-09-2023 08:23

Riannoc BOT 15-09-2023 08:43

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 16-09-2023 03:12

He waves his lantern toward the trees that are quietly groaning in the background and walks off with a little limp. The trees turn and follow him without so much as a glance toward the adventurers. As the party prepares to return to sleep, they would notice a strange blend of new senses, especially Yuki in his shifted state, his snout suddenly feels assaulted by the scents of fresh grass, wet wooden mulch, horse manure, and most prominently, a smokey smell of a recently raging forest fire, almost triggering some sort of internal instinct of alarm.
Riannoc BOT 16-09-2023 06:19
## ‚ÄúWHO FARTED!?‚Äù
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 16-09-2023 09:13
*After a pragmatic breakfast that's never missing its most important component -- a fresh pot of tea brewed to perfection -- the adventurers pack up and head west, thankfully not running into anymore strange druids or animated trees. The party travels on the road, Vesperhale faithfully pulling the wagon at a steady pace, through an uneventful morning. About one hour after the big vague glow of the sun behind the clouds passes its apex, you come to a crossroad that splits off to the south. Those of you who have been there, or have observed this area, or have talked to other adventurers about this place would know that if you were to follow the road southeast, you would gradually gain elevation until you come an ancient, dilapidated manor. And frequently, the persistent and never dying revenants clad in dented armor crested with emblems of a silver dragon congregate there and launch their unceasing campaigns from that locale.* What each of you would notice is that strange blend of smells you acquired last night still linger on you.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 16-09-2023 11:00
As soon as the old druid was gone, Yuki undoes his shifter‚Äôs form and takes a deep inhale, like he has been holding his breath for a long time. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know what is going on with the scents, but I‚Äôm going to sleep, my head is starting to hurt,‚Äù he announces before hitting the sack, questions and doubts about this journey popping their ugly heads in his dreams. Morning comes and they pack up. The journey begins again. Most of this is done in silence besides the occasional necessary talk. The caravan isn‚Äôt large per say, but it isn‚Äôt small either. For Yuki, who has been travelling on foot most of the time, it is‚Ä¶ comfortable. It also means that he does not have to put any thought as to where he is walking, and so his mind is running. If his brain was powered by a little hamster in a wheel, it‚Äôd be sprinting like crazy right now. Nyr mentioned he may have a way to provide him with an Astral Wandering experience, which he has missed dearly for months now. It is to a point where he feels part of him is being left in a dark room to rot. His mental well-being is under constant attack, and to remedy that, he is willing to go through what most would qualify as borderline suicidal. But he isn‚Äôt stupid either and he knows his limits. And if this gang of colorful individuals is heading towards something on the other side of the ‚ÄúWarning: Stupid Ahead‚Äù fence, he has got to know before he jumps over it. And he knows the mushroom hunting isn‚Äôt the end of it. It is barely the start. . (edited)

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 18-09-2023 23:35
*After Lars strong armed his way into Yuki's magical prune, the shadar Kai pops it into his mouth and begins chewing. The taste is a bit musty, but overall pleasant. Soon after, however, Lars begins smelling strong wafts of homemade alcohol -- astringent and sharp, like moonshine made in a brewer's bathtub that never saw the inside of an aging barrel, all around him. Is he in the middle of a bar of recently divorced people? Did he fall into a vat of alcohol? Is it his own clothes? Has this entire time in Barovia been a dream and he's actually a hardworking normal human who drank too much one Friday evening after getting off his shift at the local workshop forging steel? DM [CreamPuff] BOT 19-09-2023 06:54
As the party wagon continues rolling westward, until they finally see the northward split that heads toward Lake Baratok. It's not visible through the trees from this main road, but those of you who have wandered that way in your travels know that there's a strange tower in the middle of the lake. Choosing to ignore this northern path, you travel onward for another half an hour before seeing the split to the south. Even covered in a thick layer of cloud and fog, you can see in the distance, behind the trees, the looming, frosty peaks of Mount Ghakis. Even in the middle of what should be summer, there is snow covering its slopes. The path ahead of you is nice and moist -- indicating quite a bit of precipitation in this part of the valley, and the forest smells earthy and untrodden.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 19-09-2023 09:48
A fairly uneventful afternoon passes and the party pushes on until the chill of night is fully upon them. Having steadily gained a bit of elevation since where they rested last night, the air is feeling a bit crisper than previously, though not the bite of cold just yet. With the vague glow of the orb that suggests a moon behind the clouds already rising -- the party has the choice to bed down for the night or continue forward.

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 20-09-2023 00:10
*The party finds a clearing in the woods to make camp, electing not to start a fire this time and eating dry rations instead. Riannoc still manages to brew a pot of tea, some things just can't be compromised upon. Another night come and gone, much more quiet this time. The 95¬∞ heat making it almost tough for some of you to sleep or trance as your sweat soaks through your clothes, some perhaps resorting to shedding layers out here in the wild. The magic of these cubes are indeed potent for those within range. When morning comes, it's time for the party to decide on what to do with the faithful dark horse and Riannoc's lavish wagon.*
1
Yuki Northernfur BOT 20-09-2023 13:18
Yuki wakes and groggily eats a few rations for breakfast. Mornings are not his forte. He sits there, on the ground, a dozen feet away, looking at the horse and the caravan, wondering how they would fare by themselves. Lars said it wouldn't take more than a day, but there is no guarantee on that. Who knows how difficult those mushrooms really are to find. He stands up and walks around the caravan, looking at the surrounding trees, the bushes, the rocks, the layout of the land. He evaluates the most probable places beasts, monsters and humans could come from. Then he gets to work. Using branches, leaves, and a tiny spool of black thread that never seems to run, Yuki starts working on traps. Swinging logs, contraptions that would catapult thorns, feet catchers, etc. He's not sure how successful they'll be, and it'd probably depend on what comes this way, but he straightens out after a while, satisfied with his efforts.

Doing his best to hide the hideous thing while making things seem as natural as possible. The horse would have to sit still, unlikely. But maybe it can be convinced? [speak with animals] "Hey there buddy. You've been great so far. But the rest of the trip up the mountain is gonna be a bit treacherous. Do you think you can stay hidden behind the wagon until we return? Is there anything we cam do to help keep you safe until we return?" (edited)

Yuki Northernfur BOT 21-09-2023 06:40

He turns to look at the mountain in the distance. A quick look at the sun, and he adds: "Yes, we really should get going. From memory, getting to where the roc is from here, at least according to the directions we received, should take between 5 and 7 hours, depending on our pace. If at that point we want to take that option, we'll have to find the roc before dusk or risk having to wait a whole night before resuming our search. Then kill it. Then find the nest if it hasn't been done." "If we want to stick to our original plan to find the mushrooms, then we need to add another 2 to 4 hours to the previous 5-7 to get to the west side of the mountain, and high enough to get to where the snow is permanent. Luckily, it should be dark by then, so finding the mushrooms may be easier since they apparently glow, but we'll need to find them before dawn or it'll get much more difficult." "In both cases, we need to come back afterwards. We can't leave your horse and stuff here a whole week, so let's get packing, yeah?" (edited)

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 21-09-2023 09:05
Between Yuki and Nyr, they do an amazing job of concealing the wagon using natural elements they scavenged. Even someone who has a trained hunter's eye would need to be quite close up and look very closely to find traces of a wagon, you think. Nyr's gentle and tricky persuasion to Vesperhale earns a stern nod as she agrees not to be a hero and look for trouble, but will instead enjoy her well earned quiet vacation. This deal is sweetened by the fact that with Lars' help, Riannoc locates a well-hidden blackberry bush, as well as a patch of wild carrots and radishes. With their quick foraging hands, they amass a giant pile of delicious treats that would last the mare a whole week.

Shadow Matthaeus the Raven [Riannoc] BOT 21-09-2023 19:31

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 21-09-2023 19:50
*Leaving the heavy wagon behind, safely concealed, the party now can move at double the pace. A morning of trekking southward on an ever climbing increasing incline brings the party close to where you would know a perilous, high bridge sits above the Luna River. The roads are clearly not as well maintained as the thoroughfare that you took westward. The vegetation is still thick here, even though the temperature outside of your cube radius, as Lars would find out if he ever wandered too far away, has become rather cold.*
Lars BOT 21-09-2023 22:13
*And wander too far he would, sometimes! See, that's the beauty of his master plan all along. By staying close to his Brother, he would enjoy the sweet, lifesaving, gentle embrace of unbearable heat. But, since he knew a trek would be in front of them, he calculated that his dark, heavy clothes would push his internal temperature too far, and the cold bite of the frost winds were a welcome change when he reached that point. Which he already did, a couple of times. Truly, the epitome of his intellect. A plan perfectly thought out, executed and delivered! Well done, Lars! Of course, he also could've just bought the damn thing and stuck it inside his Bag of Holding when he didn't want it, thus making the party much more dynamic by allowing each member to act alone in the freezing mountains if the situation called for it. But I said epitome of his intellect, so that's the best we get. He continues the trek, keeping an eye on the sky.*

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 22-09-2023 20:15
*As the party observes, they have been slowly advancing under the shadow of the treeline until the come up to a majestic bridge made out of stone, crossing a chasm that drops hundred of feet to rushing waters of the Luna river below. The structure is quite weathered and worn, but you can tell that this was built with great precision and grandeur, with multiple turrets and watch towers on both sides of the chasm and in the middle as well. You would need to leave the cover of the trees to make it across, however.*
Lars BOT 22-09-2023 23:29

The bridge looked safe, at least from where he was standing. There wasn't much in the way of secondary passageways, so onwards he went. Keeping low to the ground and with Nyr's strange, clouding magic, Lars made quick work of the bridge span and hid on the other side, confident that the way was clear.
Nyr BOT 23-09-2023 00:22

Yuki Northernfur BOT 23-09-2023 01:28
Yuki lets the others go first before lightly cracking his fingers and neck. "Alright," he thinks, "I should be able to do this." As he starts sneaking along the bridge using the parapet, a snow storm seems to hit them, concealing their movements even further. Snow? Yuki smiles. Being in his element, he lets loose. His silent steps are rendered even more muttered by the soundproofing effect of the snowflakes. His white hair and white skin are even more camouflaged. His acrobatics let him jump, slide, and tumble around. From the roc's perspective, or anyone else looking from outside the "storm", all they would see are small bursts of wind and movement, like someone is quickly swiping his hand in a giant cloud of smoke and all one could see were the ripples. Everyone started in front of Yuki and made good pace, but once they reach the other end, they see the shifter casually sitting on a rock drawing in the snow with a stick like he's been waiting for them forever. You can see that the volume of water is quite high, probably from very slow snowmelt, but the river is not fast flowing. The giant glances over and stares at the group that has just arrived, but does not seem to react.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 25-09-2023 08:00

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 27-09-2023 19:55

Nightwalker (Polymorph Lars) BOT 27-09-2023 19:59
