DM [CreamPuff] BOT 01-12-2023 00:52

Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-12-2023 01:54
Yuki wakes up between Riannoc and Nyr, but his eyes are difficult to open. His brain activates, and memories come rushing; the Blue Water Inn, the room, the tea, the poison, the atrocious sensations. He isn't feeling any pain at the moment, so either it has receded, or he is truly dead. The physical sensations of the grass on his back and the hands locked in his give him the hope that it is the former and the whole ordeel is now over. He slowly opens his eyes, both excited and anxious at what he is going to see. Did the poison work? Are they in another plane? Or are they still in the room and they have just slept through the only sunny day a year Barovia gets? If he was wary of missing out on a sunny day, he need not worry any longer. Boy, is it sunny here! As his eyes get accustomed to his environment, so does his keen nose, sniffing all the pleasant odors of flowers, and trees, and grass, and that subtle but annoying, persisting smell of forest fire. Though at the moment, he doesn't mind it so much. He stands up. He is jubilating. He doesn't even notice his lack of clothes. He wouldn't care. He had done it! This is the sensation he was trying to recreate. They are not in Barovia anymore! At least not mentally. It is possible! He was brought to that shithole through Astral Wandering, and now there is actual hope that he could do the same to get back out! This is huge. Although his projection would eventually have to go back to his body, in the meantime, he can interact with things and people from other realms and planes! Tell them where he is, ask for help, research a way out! Or even... tell his family he was fine. On his way back. To wait a little. A tear forms in his eyes. A tear of happiness, of relief. . Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-12-2023 01:54
His goal for this adventure has just been completed. He is satisfied. He could go back at any time and feel justified to call it mission accomplished. But Nyr isn't done here. DM [CreamPuff] BOT 05-12-2023 09:44

I'm glad to see you have arrived, just in time to catch these ringleaders congregating. It seems you had both the bravery in ingesting the deadly poison and the cunning to locate an ingredient that lets you visit rather than die. That's very promising. You may be without equipment, but the ringleaders also have brought some henchmen along, and you should be able to take them out easily and appropriate their gear. Otherwise, there are plenty of herbs for you to make poisons and potions, and the little hut to the north of you might have plenty of tools for you to craft what you need. On your way there, I left a little bundle for you between three rocks by the pond. I know you'll be fine as you've shown your resourcefulness. May your hunt be swift and glorious.
Again, it remains unsigned.

Yuki Northernfur BOT 07-12-2023 01:38
At the front of the group leading the rest to the cabin he saw in the distance, Yuki keeps an eye on his surroundings, hoping to avoid confrontation with... anything that could live in such a peculiar environment. He doesn't even look at the others as he replies out loud: "Who was it that said 'It's not about the shape and size of the wand, but how you use it, after all'?" he asks, mimicking Riannoc's voice with barely muffled sarcasm in his voice. "Your wands might be bigger, but one of you spurts their white stuff as soon as there's some action. Doesn't even wait for his friends to get out of the splash zone. Just sprays it everywhere." "And the other relies on illusions, so who knows how big that staff really is, right?" While he lets that sink in for a second, he can't deny that Lars did ask a relevant question that remains unanswered: how did the silhouette know when and where they would land once they got to this plane? What else does it know? How closely are they being watched? An uneasy feeling creeps up his spine.

1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 07-12-2023 08:30
*It doesn't take but five minutes of a brisk walk on a little dirt path through the woods for the party to arrive at a small pond. Indeed, a cluster of three rocks is found, and between them, a tightly packed bundle of a few things wrapped in a hemp cloth. The party would find 2 daggers, 14 darts, a boomerang, two small vials of red liquid, which looks a lot like a common healing potion, and two small vials of green liquid, which looks like common poison.*
Riannoc BOT 07-12-2023 10:52
Riannoc looks visibly annoyed at the comment regarding his stick. "What a baseless accusation, sure, my stick gets longer depending how you stroke it. It's originally a staff anyway, but it's no illusion!" *Hmph. As he proves by holding the shadar-stick up and down. Then finally, finally he takes notice of the common potions and picks one up. But where to store it? Yes, where? That's a good question, if only his magical bag is here, whatever, handheld it is. Then he proceeds forward to the hut*
Lars BOT 07-12-2023 19:07
He simply stares at the items, then looks at his own magical, divinely imbued weapon and grunts. - I have no use for these things, but I guess I have a hand to hold the other, uh... Potion? He picks the red liquid vial up.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 08-12-2023 10:16
*As the group divides up the gear they found in the little pouch, they continue trekking northward toward the only sign of civilization, and soon they come up on a small river crossing. On both sides of the river, the party would see that there are four figures -- elvish or eladrin in stature -- wrapped in dark gray cloaks. Two are keeping a lookout, one is polishing her blade in the river, and another one is meditating on a rock, seeming to be thrumming with some magical power. Nyr would recognize the dark gray garb -- a telltale sign of their membership in the Wisps.*
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 08-12-2023 10:17
They do not yet locate the party, although one of them seems to be extremely alert with sharp eyes. Yuki is both silent and incredibly fast to react, and he knows the party is about to be spotted.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 08-12-2023 10:17
You see that all four of them seem to be wearing some nice armor -- possibly for you to be able to take advantage of...
Nyr BOT 09-12-2023 01:29
Nyr crouches down and points out the Wisp members to the shadow twins. He takes his hand and runs it across his neck in the international sign for "kill these mother fuckers" The gear would be useful, could be used as disguises to help with infiltration. But Nyrs mind was far from thinking about strategy. Setting eyes on that garb brought forward only one thing, anger. They didn't have to die because of the strategic advantage it would give him and his companions. They had to die because of the color of their cloaks. They had to die because of the company they keep. They had to die because of their life choices, forced or purposely. They had to die because they simply existed in this moment, and were in the way.
2
Yuki Northernfur BOT 09-12-2023 02:45
Yuki stops the proceeding as he spots the other people. Not knowing whether they are friends or foes, he turns his head towards Nyr, who silently informs everyone that these guys need to go down. Yuki nods his heads in the international sign for "ok". Evaluating that the ones looking at their surroundings would be the most likely to spot them, he thinks of aiming at them first. But the one meditating on the rock seems like the easiest target of them all, and so he decides to go for that one. He silently pull on the invisible bowstring, a light arrow appearing as he does. He's glad it's so sunny and it doesn't stand out. The arrow flies through the air and plants itself right in the man's shoulder before blowing up in specks of light and disappearing, leaving only an open wound. "Here we go guys! If you can, finish that guy off first," he whispers before moving to another spot in view of his next shot. (edited)
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 09-12-2023 08:46
*The scouts who were keeping a lookout gasp as they see their companion take a shining arrow to the torso and nearly dying. They spot the party and draw their bows. The one on this side of the river strafes sideways until he spots Yuki -- two arrows are fired and strike the shifter. The other scout who was extremely watchful spits out the pipe she was smoking on, launching an arrow into Lars and one into Riannoc.* "Who are these fuckers??" She asks in shock.
Lars BOT 09-12-2023 09:57

He twists his Pact Weapons and three magical slashes fly off, two hitting far from the target, but the last cutting the spellcaster in half. He knows how dangerous they can be.* - FACE ME! He screams to the rest, arms open and his shameful body on display. (edited)

Nyr BOT 10-12-2023 14:37
It all happened faster than he was expecting. Even without all their equipment, his friends were very good at dispensing indiscriminate justice upon their enemies. He runs up and avoids Lars and his target, that hit he just took looked painful and Nyr wasn't about that. The Eladrin reaches for his trusty bow, brings it out in front of him....and realizes there is no bow. He holds in his hand the Boomerang he just picked up "Well, first time for everything....how do I use this thing?" He rears back and throws it at his target. It spins and wobbles wildly as it awkwardly flies through the air. Stopping as it makes contact with the scouts face. "Oh shit....that worked..... Interesting." He deftly draws the dagger next...from where? We don't know, don't ask. This time he's more than confident in his ability to use the weapon....he used daggers frequently. A quick flip of the wrist sends it ziping through the air like a silver elongated bullet. The tree didn't see it coming. "....shit" Now weaponless, again, Nyr realizes the errors of his decisions. A violent wind full of ice shards and snow circles around him as he is instantaneously carried right up to the poor scout. He reaches down and picks up the dagger. His cold, calculated, merciless dark blue frozen eyes lock onto the scouts as he puts the dagger point up against the enemies throat. "I won't miss from this range..." Probably (edited)

Nyr BOT 12-12-2023 00:06

Denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance....all flash in his dead eyes over a single, eternity taking, second as he falls lifelessly at Nyrs feet. Yuki eyes their new ethereal companion with a mix of awe and reservation. What is that? A ghost? They can control ghosts, too? If his mother were here, she would have told him not to mingle with the likes of them over a dozen times by now, all for different reasons. Looks like there‚Äôs just one more of them reasons. That thing is friendly, right? It looks friendly for now. Will it stay this way? Can it do things? Like could it cook dinner for them? He‚Äôd love to be able to say that a ghost cooked him some dinner. Can it talk? He bets if it could, it would be cursing their ass all day long for having killed him. Sounds annoying. As he moves about, Yuki can‚Äôt take his eyes off it. It‚Äôs so off-putting yet mesmerizing. Like when one blows their nose; they know that what came out will be gross to look at, but they still look. Besides that, he is proud of how things went. They split the targets among themselves logically, there was good communication, and things were over before they knew it. They even prevented some bloody flying thingy from escaping. Sure, some of them got roughed up a bit, including himself, but all in all, it could have been much worse considering their ‚Äúnatural‚Äù state. ‚ÄúBetter start gearing up,‚Äù he says out loud, ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt know when the next chance will be.‚Äù He moves towards the male scout, which he had spotted wearing a very appealing studded leather, and takes it off him. Might as well take his shortsword, just in case. Oh, and is that a potion? It‚Äôs freaking Yuletide! After donning the clothes and pocketing the items, he makes his way towards the hut. He‚Äôs fairly sure there isn‚Äôt anyone inside, as they would have most likely come out to help their companions, but who really knows? So as he gets closer to it, he slows down his approach, both looking for traps or movements around the building and through the windows, while keeping an ear out for any suspicious sounds.
Lars BOT 13-12-2023 12:51

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-12-2023 08:11

Outside of the hut are a few felled tree trunks that have been fashioned into benches, as well as a trunk where firewood is chopped. The area and the hut are otherwise quiet.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 14-12-2023 08:48

The benches and firewood give Yuki the impression that either this group had been here for a while, or there is some sort of rotation between guards so that there is always some sort of Wisps presence in the area. It is worth staying alert towards their surroundings at all times. He silently gets up to a window and carefully tries to peek inside. One thing's for sure, it smells delicious.

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 14-12-2023 09:05
*Yuki sees a medium-sized fire of aromatic logs in the fireplace, roasting a whole bird of some kind -- large quail? A turkey? -- over a metal rack. Little droplets of fat drizzle down and sizzle as they hit the logs. The little hut looks empty -- a couple straw beds and some bedrolls on the floor, barrels of water, wine skins, bowls of fruits and baskets of root vegetables -- this looks like a nice little base of operations. To his relief, Yuki also sees a variety of tools laid about on two different work tables -- some woodcarving tools, some leatherworking tools, a small but serviceable anvil and a hammer and tongs, as well as a shelf well-stocked with what looks like herbalism supplies. The Wisps seem to make good use of the resources around here when they come for their annual visit.*

Yuki Northernfur BOT 15-12-2023 03:21
Looking around the hut, Yuki is impressed by the amount of things they were able to cram into it. All sorts of tools and materials to make all sorts of things. They sure kept themselves busy. He guesses that once you‚Äôre here out in the woods, there‚Äôs only so much one can do to entertain themselves, might as well make something useful. He spots an herbalist kit on a table near one of the walls. He has recently studied the art, and he gets a little burst of excitement at the idea of trying it out in the field. He looks at the herbs and the beakers, the thin but long soft pipes linking the contraptions together. The vials, thermometers, candles for heating, gauges, valves‚Ä¶. This kit is not at all the same as the one he had been practicing on! Doubting his capabilities, he nevertheless decides to try his hand at something a bit ambitious. It starts well, doing the manual work of grinding some plants and leaves in a mortar, boiling a bit of water with the candle, preparing the vials. He inserts the herbs in the boiling water. And things start going wrong. The potion gets pink, then red, but almost immediately turns to purple as the flame is too close to the beaker. The boiling resumes, and fumes start seeping out through the pipe on top of the beaker, making its way to the following vial and drying on the surfaces, tainting the glass. Trying to save the potion, Yuki yanks it off the flame, but he hasn‚Äôt moved it far that the heat of the beaker burns his hand and he drop it. It falls on its side, the contents spilling on the remaining herbs, and ruining all hopes he had to make a potion. He stays there, both hands on the table, head down, sighing heavily. What a disappointment. That‚Äôs when, from the corner of his eye, he spots the telltale slits of a trapdoor in the floor. His eyes sparkles once more. The potion‚Äôs mourning was over. ‚ÄúHey guys, I think I found something interesting,‚Äù he says, pointing at the corner of the hut.

Nyr BOT 16-12-2023 03:52
The Eladrin stands there in a daze. He knew the names, but hadn't heard them spoken aloud in some time. A knot catches in his throat as he bounces back and forth between anger, sadness, and fear at the mention of their targets It's at this moment, Yukis attempted potion hits the ground. Nyr shakes his head to lazily snap out of his funk, and snatches up the bottle and as much of the contents as possible. "Let me try, I'm pretty accustomed to the herbs of this plane" Nyr begins to meticulously grind up various leaves in a clay bowl. Shaking, he tries to poor the crushed leaves into the beaker, but his nerves get the best of him. A loud shattering sound can be heard as he drops the clay bowl onto the fragile beaker, breaking it. A trickle of blood runs down the hand he was using to stabilize the glass instrument. "I...uh...sorry. shall we move onto the trap door then?"
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 16-12-2023 17:25
Miraculously, as the failed concoction drips out of the broken clay bowl, mixing with Nyr's eladrin blood, it somehow coagulates and stabilizes onto the ground below. Nyr doesn't notice this as he fixates on the trapdoor, but Lars, who is looking around the little hut for a giant chunk of rock he can turn into a shield... Sees the coagulated byproduct begin to glow with a shimmering red light that's potent and magical, similar to the vials of healing potion! "Oy, Nyr you bastard, bottle your blood up, it just might save you!" Lars says. But decided to scoop up the mixture and put it into an empty vial from the workbench himself. The trapdoor looks like it's frequently trafficked, and currently, there's no sign of a lock.

Riannoc BOT 16-12-2023 18:24

Yuki Northernfur BOT 17-12-2023 07:19

They move together towards the trapdoor, and are soon joined by Riannoc. The three of them just stare at the seemlingly unlocked liftable piece of floor, crouched around it like a group of kids around a box with unknown contents. "This is surely not a trap, right?" Riannoc says. Yuki tears his gaze from the trapdoor to look at Riannoc. He duckwalks two steps backwards and gestures with his hand towards the floor. Anyone with a minimum of insight would interpret his body language as saying: 'Come on. Come on! Open it. It's great down there. Treasures. Come on. Are you game?'
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 17-12-2023 23:23
*Nyr walks up to the trapdoor, clearly losing his patience, and pulls it up silently. It doesn't make a sound as it opens, revealing a cavern within and a ladder leading down. As the eladrin climbs down -- he is as silent as a cat stalking an oblivious bird. The cavern comes into view -- piles and piles of crates haphazardly stacked against each other. In the center of the cavern, a big cistern of some sort where water flows into. On the other end of the cavern is a small makeshift shelter. Nyr spots three figures: A drow who looks like she has no time for anyone, in intimidate, dark armor, reading a small book in the far back corner, leaning against a wall. A hobgoblin who's quite muscular, with purple facepaint on, several javelins strapped to his back, and a longsword resting by his leg. He is picking his nose. And a third figure, almost blending into the dark and unnoticeable if not for Nyr's perceptive eyes. A slender elven figure covered head to toe in dark clothes, sharpening her dagger and dipping it into a flask of hazy, fuchsia liquid. The cavern is silent and cold. This seems to be a place where the Wisps store goods.* (edited)
Riannoc BOT 18-12-2023 10:27
*Congratulations! You‚Äôve all made an impressive collective attempt for stealth and you all remain largely undetected throughout the passage. Of course, curse Riannoc and his cane for there is no softening the clanking reverberating the halls. Whatever the wisps were doing, they definitely can hear him now.* <Sighs> ‚ÄúFiiiiiiiiiine‚Ä¶ I‚Äôll give them a distraction.‚Äù *However, ‚Äúdistraction‚Äù proves to be an understatement. A snap of his fingers this time summons a rift to Shadowfell itself. To escape? To summon a monstrosity beyond compare? No, whatever came from that rift wasn‚Äôt entirely perceptible to the mortal senses, even less so for the two that saw it directly. Puffs of unholy black smoke fumes from the two victims‚Äô eyes and mouth as they fall on their knees, catatonic. Perhaps they‚Äôre reexperiencing their best memory, or perhaps their greatest fear. Nobody knows.* ‚ÄúAye gentlemen, enjoy.‚Äù The shadow elf himself reappears next to the Assassin, making himself an actual distraction for his allies to strike. (edited)
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 18-12-2023 11:58
*The Assassin doesn't look startled as much as annoyed when the Shadar Kai appears next to her after enthralling her companions. Yuki Northernfur BOT 28-12-2023 15:50

That's right. That's right!! They did this to Nyr. To his family. If not directly, then by affiliation. The big shots of their organisation must have known! For sure! There's no begging, no crawling out of this one! This is... the right thing to do... right? Yuki hesitates for a fraction of a second. This is typical of him. The decisive moment, yet he can't help but hesitate at taking another sentient's life. What if's and how about's. What if he didn't know about Nyr's family and had one of his own. How about they captured him alive and asked him questions instead of killing him? He shoots an arrow at the precise moment these thoughts overwhelm his mind. It plants itself in the older Eladrin's upper shoulder instead of his heart. The explosion renders his left arm almost useless. But will this be enough? Yuki tries to overcome his hesitations: "Get him!!" he shouts, yet his tone would sound funny to the experienced. It is as if he's trying to convince himself in his assertion. His young age transpires at this moment.

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 31-12-2023 22:38
*As the party digs through the storage, which doesn't seem to be filled with too much stuff as this is mostly a hideout at the moment, the battered gang boards up the shack as well as the trapdoor and takes a breather. An hour later, no one seems to have bothered to come around. The elves and shifter must decide where to proceed to next. From what the risen dead told you, there seems to be two more locations of interest: one is a storage facility of some sort for more precious goods. The other, "the meeting grove", sounds like where more important people might be congregating.*
Lars BOT 31-12-2023 23:02
After he's done bandaging up what he can, still feeling mighty sore from all the bruises and cuts, he grunts and helps to search around... Finding a nice wand in one of the boxes. He pockets it. He also discards his leather armor for a more favorable breastplate and a shield, finally! - We should press the assault before they realize what's going on... But know that we will need to choose carefully how to approach further battles.
Nyr BOT 01-01-2024 04:16
Nyr begins the process of grabbing bodies and nonchalantly chucking them down the pit. "We should probably hit the storage place next, maybe procure more gear" yeet, another down the hole. He gets to Aarhus, grabs the body by the color and drags him to the edge. Hesitating for a moment, he gives the lifeless corpse a disappointed look. "Shame....you were way weaker than I figured. I should of killed you a long time ago." Yeet
Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-01-2024 04:39
Yuki listens to Nyr's description of the older eladrin. He slowly lifts his chin high up then brings it back down as slowly, like a giant nod, at the mention of the man being "super emo". Like that just explained everything. No more questions needed. He helps bring the bodies closer to Nyr as his friend chucks them down the hole one by one. He avoids looking directly at the one he disfigured. He kinda wants to, but not at the same time. Like he really wants to know what she'd look like while knowing he'd regret knowing. You can't unsee certain things after all. Like Riannoc's bare buttocks when he bent down to pick up his cane when they arrived in this realm. Scalded his retinas. Will haunt his nightmares. When they are done and confident there isn't anything else useful down there, they all make their way upstairs, then board the trapdoor before moving on to barricading the rest of the house. Outside again, sitting on the benches and logs dotting the yard and keeping an eye out to make sure they aren't about to get some unwanted visitors, they talk about their next move while recuperating a bit. Unaware of the discussion the other three had with dead people, he follows Lars' comment: "I agree, we should keep moving. I don't think our window of action is that wide; after all, not only will the Wisps move on once their meeting... mating.. party? Whatever they're here for... once that's over, not only will they move on, but our actual physical selves may wake up at any time. And maybe not all at the same time, too. Would suck to have your friends disappear in the middle of a fight. I usually like to think things over and make sound plans, but in this particular case, the faster we get this done, the least risky it gets." "Where to next, then?" he asks Nyr who would be in the best position to know what target to hit next.
1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 01-01-2024 06:58
The elves would remember that the dead minion said that the "storage" is found to the west, and the "meeting place" is found to the east.
Riannoc BOT 01-01-2024 07:28
"I'm almost out of steam. If the rest of them are as tough as that old timer or even more, I suppose jumping straight at them all at once would be problematic. We either need a plan to single them out or... maybe one of you sneaky sneaky types have a look at the storage and see what we can pilfer?"
1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 02-01-2024 01:45
*When everyone's a bit more rested, and having found dried meats and nuts and fruits around the little shack to snack on, the party heads out of the hut and heads west. There aren't too many branching roads since this pocket dimension does not seem particularly spacious. The party walks for a good 30 minutes before they see from afar a strange structure -- among the grassy plains, a strange, dark, rectangular structure sits. From far away, it seems like a very square, geometric building of some sort. As the sharp-eyed party gets closer, you see that it's actually walls of dark green leaves -- hedges!*
Lars BOT 02-01-2024 12:39
After their destination comes fully into view, stretches his neck. - Alright, Yuki, are you up to the task of scouting this place? We need to look out for three things, mainly: He raises a finger. - A good, quiet entry point. Another finger. - Number and apparent combat capacity of occupants. Last finger. - Bottlenecks and natural cover to divide the groups and make our lives easier.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 02-01-2024 15:45
As the group draws closer to its destination, they come across what can only be described as a hedge maze. The classic hedge maze, with its high green plant-like walls and what they can only assume are twists and dead-ends inside. And it puzzles him greatly. Why the actual fuck would the Wisps take the time and put in the effort to grow this maze? Are their members actually expected to walk through this thing every time they want to get to the storage room? Better come with a freaking shopping list to make sure you don't forget something, right?.. No, no, they must have another way to get there... Would it be that much more time-consuming to look for that way instead? Did the Wisps expect to have so many intruders in this pocket dimension that they thought it would be worth it to grow this? How unsecured is this place? Anyone can barge in and try their luck at the maze? Not a defended wall, not an army.... a maze, made up of plants that seem vulnerable to fire, blasts of almost any sorts, or scissors. Did they think this through? They seem to have put so much effort into this that Yuki is starting to feel that humoring them and just walking in there would be the moral thing to do. But this isn't a game. "I mean..." he starts, looking back at Lars after contemplating the maze for a dozen seconds, "I could, but I'm not sure how useful that would be. The first thing I would do is look for a way around the thing, right? There's no way everyone just goes through this thing for a pinch of salt for their soup... But let's say they do. Then my scouting is limited. They are man-made corridors with nothing to hide behind. The people patrolling that maze have two ways to look; forward or backward. However sneaky I am, I can't just... you know, pass people like I'm invisible, yeah? So I would look around until I get squeezed between patrols." "Would that be realistically better than all of us going in? I don't mind, really, I can go, but...."
1
Lars BOT 03-01-2024 08:03
- ... Fair point. How about you go ahead, say, 60ft of us then?
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 03-01-2024 08:22
*Yuki's ears hear everything, and his eyes dart around the outside of the hedgemaze. There are no posted guards, no visible traps, and no monsters that are threatening to pop out from the bush to eat them.... yet. After doing a rapid and silent perimeter, he would spot two entrances to the maze. One from the west and one from the east -- neither seems particularly straightforward, as he is only able to glimpse a bit into the entrance of each before the maze turns and cuts off his vision.*
Nyr BOT 04-01-2024 01:03
Nyr follows the group in silence. He had a lot on his mind. He should be celebrating, one down, the world was already a better place. But, instead, he felt....nothing. There was no satisfaction, no joy, no fulfillment, no remorse or regret....just nothing Thats a lie. There was something. Deep, deep, deep down there was a little microscopic tinge of anxiety The anxiety one feels when their main driving force in life, is about to come to an end. What is Nyr without his need for closure and/or vengeance? But for now, he's not aware of it. He shrugs the anxiety off as a nervous reaction to entering the hedge maze. Obviously, that's all it can be, right? "Lead the way, Yuki, we will follow from a distance. Don't turn a corner unless you know we saw which way you went."
1
1
Yuki Northernfur BOT 04-01-2024 08:17
Yuki shrugs; after all, scouting can't really hurt. He lifts a funger in a gesture that would ask the group to wait a minute, and he goes to explore. He comes back a bit later to update his friends about the situation. "I went around the whole thing and saw two entrances: one on the west side, the other on the east side. That would indicate that our goal is somewhere inside the maze and we don't have to go through the whole length of it." "During my little escapade, I couldn't see or hear anything. Like the maze is empty. But I can't shake the feeling that it couldn't be unattended. There has got to be something or someone in there." Lars mentions the west entrance as their way in. "Sure. Makes little difference, I couldn't see far inside from either entry points. Follow me." Yuki guides his companions to the west entrance. "As Nyr suggested, I will go in first, and gesture for you to come at every corner if the path is clear. If it isn't, I will come back to you instead and let you know what I saw." "Stay sharp and watch your rear." Yuki stealths his way inside, proceeding slowly and looking for anything that moves or makes sound, as well as traps. He stops at every intersection, discreetly looking around the corners before gesturing to the others to join him, then moving forward. He feels like something is hiding in there and waiting for the opportunity to jump them...

Nyr BOT 04-01-2024 23:50

1
Yuki Northernfur BOT 05-01-2024 00:36
Yuki slowly goes inside the maze. His eyes are darting left and right, but his ears are open to sounds coming from all directions. Only a few feet away from his group, he can hear Riannoc's comment about keeping their hands on the right wall. He frowns. That would work if they wanted to go through the maze with both entry points on outer edges, but in this case where they want to reach the middle, it is absolutely not guaranteed to work, especially with two entry points. That guy would get them walking in circles. He's about to turn around to make sure that they do not follow that advice when the conversation turns to talking plants and back-flipping. He forgets about the hands and the walls. He stops and watches Nyr greet the branches near him. This is going to be much more entertaining.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 05-01-2024 03:08
The leaves of tall hedges rustle in the wind and whisper back to Nyr: "we're great. This place is plentiful with rain... Delicious rain!"
Nyr BOT 05-01-2024 03:14
Nyr shakes his head in agreement. "You know, I was thinking that exact thing the other day, probably one of the best rains I've ever experienced. 10 out of 10, would recommend" He gestures to Riannoc "See my friend there? He's about to attempt a backflip, and I can't wait to see it. But we need some help first And I think you are the best hedges for the job. The failed backflip will be entertaining enough for your troubles, I promise."
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 05-01-2024 09:56
"Sure. We are the best hedges. We help!" The leaves gently say back in a chorus of agreement.
Riannoc BOT 05-01-2024 10:15
"...later. Wouldn't want to break my neck when you all still need my magic, charm, and wits." For a moment he was left speechless. A just karma for the big mouthed shadow elf.
Lars BOT 05-01-2024 12:48
The Shadarkai laughs audibly at Riannoc's suggestion. - Stop playing around, Riannoc. Plants can't spe-- But then, apparently, they do. Or Nyr has gone insane and is talking to himself. Lars is left open-mouthed and unable to discern if the Eladrin is just messing around or actually talking to vegetables. - We're all mad here.
1
Nyr BOT 06-01-2024 04:52
"Ha, don't mind them" ,He gestures to the shadow twins "They lack simple communication skills. Usually overly dramatic and a bit self centered. Thanks for being cool. You're, without a doubt, the best Hedge maze I've ever talked to." He nods to himself, proud of his cleverness "Say, mind telling me what we can expect deeper inside? Where does this all lead anyway?"
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 06-01-2024 05:15
"We see these cloaked figures walk in and out. All the time, but we don't really pay attention to what they do. I think they hide stuff in little boxes made out of the dead bodies of our sturdier kin throughout this structure that's made up of us!" The leaves seem very excited to talk to Nyr, apparently they don't frequently get the opportunity to. "This morning, a few figures came through this way. They might still be inside. let me check with our neighbors." *The leaves rustle as they whisper to each other like a wave... Communicating in a chain, and a minute later, they reply, ok, so our neighbors talked to their neighbors and their neighbors to their neighbors and the rumor we hear back is that there are still some elves here! They're mostly at the center."
Yuki Northernfur BOT 06-01-2024 06:06
Yuki follows the discussion with interest. If they can get an insight about what or who is in this maze, all the better. During the exchange, the leaves which Nyr is talking to start rustling, and the leaves beside those start rustling, too. And then the ones next to those. Like a wave of rustling from one edge of the maze all the way towards the center, and then back to the start again! It is a very peculiar, but entirely wholesome sight. It makes Yuki think about the times when leaves were rustling above his head when walking in the forest though there wasn't any wind. Or when a specific pile of snow on the needles of a pine tree suddenly fell to the ground while all the other identical piles of snow on other branches stayed put. Or when he swore he had heard something move in a bush but there was nothing there despite looking everywhere. Maybe, just maybe, it was the leaves having a giggle.
1
2
Lars BOT 07-01-2024 19:06
*Incredibly touched by this display of, for a lack of better word, Feywildism, Lars approaches the hedges and starts to inspect the bushes. He longed for quite a while to return to this magical realm... Even if this is but a small glimpse of the true thing. The emotions are strong, the memories even more so. He remembers a lot of things he loved in the past, a lot of laughs, good food and company... And can't hold back his tears. Would he, and everyone else, ever be capable of truly leaving? Of truly traveling the planes to escape that accursed valley? He hopes so. He also hopes he never wakes up from this dream.*
1
1
Yuki Northernfur BOT 08-01-2024 14:27
Coming back from his little reverie and back to reality (though would this be reality? Could they dream while in a dream? ...whatever, not the place nor time), Yuki comes up to Nyr. "Alright, so we know there are some elves in there. That's good to know. Can you ask how many there are so we can be prepared?" "Also, the safest way to get there if possible. Not the quickest, the safest. I would rather get there in half an hour in one piece than in 5 minutes but missing a leg." Not certain how long the spell lasts, Yuki wants the crucial information first.
Riannoc BOT 08-01-2024 16:47
"Hmmm... on top of what our friend here said, where would we find those little boxes of your kin's dead bodies? Sounds pretty disrespectful, using their remains like that if you ask me."
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 08-01-2024 18:28
As Nyr translates Yuki and Riannoc's questions, the leaves shudder in agreement. However, they do reply, "Ooooh, a very pretty elf lady whose presence fills us with joy is here..." they pause, "along with her 3 scary companions, and a small, beautiful dragon who sits on her shoulders." "All paths seem safe to us... but maybe not to you. Some places have hidden strings, trigger blades. Some places have invisible magic, we saw her draw on ground with chalk! Our comrades tell us both exits to the hedge-city are lined with these... what do you elves call it? Traps?" "As for where the box-coffins are found, they are everywhere! In fact, there is one on the other side of me!"
Nyr BOT 09-01-2024 01:04
Nyr nods, listening intently as the hedges feed him information "Lots of traps, scary elves, pretty elf lady. This all sounds about right. You have been fantastic, moat helpful hedges. If you don't mind me asking, what exactly is in the middle of this maze?"
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 09-01-2024 01:35
"A pretty thing -- made out of stone? It shoots water into the air... sparkles, rainbow, while the pretty elf lady hums and sings... so pretty..." The leaves report back with glee. Nyr has never met her, but he gets a strong sense that the pretty elf they're talking about must be Evelyn, the Head of Negotiation. Even among the operatives of the Wisps, who rarely make conversation beyond the bare minimum required for executing on a job, he has heard rumors of her beauty and warmth. Although... it's unclear what exactly Negotiation entails for an organization such as the Wisps. Do they have large deals and contracts with entities beyond specific individuals? Do they supply kings and queens? Crafter guilds? Assassins? Hard to know.
Riannoc BOT 09-01-2024 01:45
The time to make a decision is approaching. Riannoc puts a pat on Nyr's shoulder as he offers his thought. "Listen, I'm aware of how much this ordeal means for you... but certainly there's no need to face the wisps in the middle of the maze just yet. We can always grab what we can find and turn tail before they notice. Their time will come soon enough."
Lars BOT 09-01-2024 02:06

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 09-01-2024 02:11

There won't be much talking if we succeed, and it might get a little... Ugly. I won't question your resolve any longer, Nyr, so just let me know when you're ready to go.

Yuki Northernfur BOT 10-01-2024 13:17

Nyr BOT 10-01-2024 22:54

Yuki Northernfur BOT 11-01-2024 08:09
Yuki raises his index finger at Lars‚Äô retort, but nothing comes out of his mouth. The elf‚Äôs argument‚Ä¶ actually made sense. They are in a dream state from where nothing can get out, they are pretty much set on gear, and have not the time nor the vitality to spare on fools‚Äô errands. Lars was right, focusing on their ‚Äúparty‚Äù was the thing to do. As the hedge informs them that north would bring them to their goal while south would deliver on goods, Yuki takes the lead. ‚ÄúCredit where it‚Äôs due, you can definitely use those remaining brain cells effectively,‚Äù he says over his shoulder as he walks towards the northern pathway. This is not the time to be careless, however, and so he keeps an eye out for traps, especially the chalk circle the leaves have mentioned. On his way, he looks everywhere, peeking around corners before venturing further. His sharp vision spots a very blatantly positioned chest at the deepest part of a dead-end. Very conspicuous. He gestures to his friends to look that way, but continues to the east. As Lars said, moving forward is paramount, but the others can check it out if they want. Luckily, he spots the chalk circle he was looking for. The runes are foreign to him. He crouches, picking up all the dead leaves and branches and rocks he can find (making sure not to anger the hedges by breaking anything), and leaves them in an arrow pointing to the circle. Someone more versed in magic could know better. Yuki hops over the circle and continues until he reaches the furthest corner, looking down both the path he passed and the one he's at. (edited)

1
Yuki Northernfur BOT 13-01-2024 10:07
Making sure that his companions can see where he is going, Yuki turns the corner and almost jumps out of his skin when the statue comes into view. That thing scared the shit out of him. He carefully approaches it and looks at it carefully, trying to find out clues or meaning as to why it's there in the first place. He doesn't trust it one bit.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 13-01-2024 10:14
Yuki stares and studies the statue suspiciously, as it maintains its smug smirk, but when he gets close, the shifter could positively swear that the statue... winked?! As Yuki rubs his eyes in silent disbelief, the statue really does move some more. It brings one finger to its lips in a shushing motion, then points further down the corridor toward the direction of where the center of the maze is, then proceeds to run the same finger across its neck, a face of concern as if warning Yuki to be quiet, lest he gets discovered and killed. It beckons Yuki to come closer, looking like it wants to bend down and whisper in his ear...
Yuki Northernfur BOT 13-01-2024 11:26
Yuki turns to look in the direction the statue pointed at, but can't see anything from this angle. It would make sense that something is lurking for them there, though. The statue beckons him to get closer. There's this insistent nodge in his brain telling him that this is a bad idea, but after a tremendous mental fight, his curiosity shuts it up. He slowly, oh so very slowly, gets closer, all his senses on alert, to know what the statue wants to say.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 13-01-2024 11:47
The bronze statue bends down from its pedastal, somehow not creaking metallically like you would expect it to, and whispers in a surprisingly pleasant humanoid voice, "What grows away from the sky in winter, only to die in springtime?" It winks again at Yuki, waiting patiently.
Nyr BOT 15-01-2024 03:49
Nyr easily hops over the chalk sigil and makes his way to the corner that Yuki disappeared behind. He slowly glances around the corner to see what's going on, surprised by the sight of Yuki standing there talking to a statue. If Nyrwas doubting if Yuki fit in with this group, those doubts were now safely cast aside. He was a perfect fit. "Uh...whatcha doing bud?" *Nyr whispers to at him" (edited)
Riannoc BOT 15-01-2024 09:10
Strange, it has been silent for a while and there's no sign at all from their scout. Unlike Nyr, Riannoc is not made for agile movement what with the bad leg and cane. He summarily move back and jumps, using his cane as a support. Quietly he carries on, trying to not raise an alarm.
Lars BOT 16-01-2024 08:38
Following loosely behind, Lars takes a couple seconds to kneel and investigate the drawing on the ground. Perhaps a kid did it? Are there kids here? Nyr won't like it if they have to fight children... He gets lost in thought and is unaware of what's happening around the corner.*
Yuki Northernfur BOT 16-01-2024 08:47
Yuki takes a few seconds to think, when Nyr comes around the corner and asks him what he's doing. "Hmm? Talking to the statue, of course," he whispers back. "About things that grow in winter and die in spring." He sees Nyr blink a few times. "But I think I got it," he says, turning back to the statue as if all this was very normal. "Could it be... icicles?" He waits both expectantly and nervously. For good measure, he gestures to Nyr to keep his distance. Just in case.
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 16-01-2024 08:58
The bronze elf's face stretches upward in a satisfied grin. He nods enthusiastically. "Well done, little pup." He whispers quietly right next to Yuki's ear. "Now, tell me, of all the trinkets that you didn't get to bring with you... which do you miss most?" Yuki now feels one of the statue's hands gently placed upon his hip where a satchel normally would be if he had all of his gear.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 16-01-2024 12:42
He thinks for a short while. There are three items he knows he longs for; his Wand of Magic Missiles, his Earring of Message, and his brand new Boots of Elvenkind. Playing out several scenarios in his head, he can see all of them as being useful, but alas, he feels like he should be choosing only one. Like a genie not letting "I wish I had more wishes" be a thing, he assumes abuse with the statue would result in a net negative. After internal debate, he opts for the item that could potentially have the widest range of uses. "I do miss my Earring of Message quite a bit, Mr. Statue," he whispers to the bronze humanoid who, strangely, seems more and more handsome by the minute. Was it his mind playing tricks?
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 16-01-2024 20:21
The elven statue smiles knowingly as he moves his hand up to his own ear, and when he brings his hand back down to Yuki in a closed fist, he opens it up, cupping its contents and showing it to the shifter, "Oh, you mean, this earring?" He whispers playfully. In the statue's hand, materialized out of thin air, is Yuki's earring of message. He gestures for Yuki to take it.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 17-01-2024 01:58
Yuki thanks the statue with a nod and takes the earring, putting it back on his left ear where it used to be. He feels a bit more secure in knowing he has a way to silently communicate with the rest of the group at pretty much any time, and it will allow them to expand their repertoire of strategies. He turns to Nyr. He doesn't want to expand a charge right away, so he decides to try to gesture what transpired here in the last half minute or so. From Nyr's perspective, Yuki is just pointing at different parts of his surroundings and his body, waving hands and making shapes with his fingers. The Nyr from another more technologically advanced world would compare it as a baseball coach mixing Naruto ninja hand seals with Saturday Night Fever moves. So essentially, confusing would be an understatement. Then without a word, Yuki turns around and proceeds deeper into the maze.
1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 17-01-2024 02:07
*As Yuki peeks around the corner, he spots her. Unmistakable. The Mistress of Negotiation herself. Impossible to pin down her age, she is sitting on the rim of a stone fountain, sparkling with small jets of water. All around the central courtyard are small wild flowers and butterflies chasing each other. She is quietly humming a tune that makes Yuki feel homesick for a place he has never even seen or been to. She is playing with her hair and studying her reflection in the water. The rumors of her beauty make it sound as if she's some fancy lady with breathtaking beauty that's further enhanced by the finest clothes and impeccable makeup. But instead, the eladrin before you is one of natural beauty, like a sunflower opening up to the warm glow.*
Nyr BOT 17-01-2024 09:37

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 17-01-2024 09:46

Nyr BOT 17-01-2024 22:58

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 17-01-2024 23:34

Nyr BOT 18-01-2024 00:39

This was his bow, painstakingly made by his very hands. He felt comfortable. A hunter without their hunting equipment is just an idiot. Nyr felt a sense of renewed purpose. "Thank you. Yuki Northernfur BOT 23-01-2024 00:10
Nodding his understanding, Yuki takes a deep breath and exhales slowly, calming his nerves. His group can see him transform into his arctic fox, his body rapidly covered by pure white fur, his nose elongating, his ears taking a triangular form and moving up on his head, black lines surrounding his icy blue eyes. And his amazingly puffy tail, let's not forget the puffy tail. "Here goes nothing," he growls to no one and everyone at the same time. He tries to move as quickly as he can, his gaze fixed on the woman who would notice him at any moment. And so it is that he steps on something that he should have noticed. He should have. Damn women and their attractive looks. So distracting. But he feels it. A tiny burst of wind behind him. His instincts automatically kick in and he drops, half sliding half rolling, right before a huge wave of fire explodes over his head. He can feel the heat, so hot on his fur....Hey now! That would have singed his whiteness!! Unforgivable!! It's from this position that he shoots his light arrow as Evelyn stops humming and notices him. She has this cocked-eyebrow look of controlled surprise. She seems like someone who can handle pressure and unexpected events. She might be a hassle to take down. But the arrow flies true and sticks in her right thigh before exploding, making her yelp in both pain and shock. Yuki is already on the move again, using his boosted speed to cover as much terrain as possible and block one of the entrances furthest to everyone else. That should make it easier for the others to reach the other ones. As he runs, he can see her expression change to something between anger and confusion, and her starting to rise on her feet. Shit's about to get real.

Yuki Northernfur BOT 30-01-2024 10:42

No, his body is telling him it‚Äôs not something he wants to be touched by. He‚Äôs out of range before a second drop even touches his clothes. She looks at him, crying. He looks at her, muddled. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry,‚Äù he whispers in the ruckus, but for some reason, he feels like she heard him perfectly. Her shoulders go soft, her weapon falls on the floor. She simply stands there, sobbing, like everything is gone, her reason of being stripped from her. Even without its usual strength, Yuki knows it won‚Äôt take much. He releases the string. And her soul is released from her carnal shell.

Yuki Northernfur BOT 01-02-2024 13:27
A short moment after the debacle has ended, the group can see Yuki come out of the corridor he had been in. His brows are furrowed,¬†his bow softly held in his left hand,¬†pointing down. He's looking at the ground about 20 feet in front of him, lost in thoughts. He walks seemingly by instinct towards the rest of them. His shoulders are markedly vouched. When he catches up, he looks at the corpse of the woman who had, unbeknownst to the others, charmed the shifter. His brows furrow even more deeply. Even the person concerned, unfamiliar with the many shapes of magic, can't put a finger on what is wrong. After a few seconds, he closes his eyes, turns his head away, and takes a deep breath. He pinches the bridge of his nose and starts talking, his eyes still shut. "I think we should, um... well at least I should, rest," he says. His words are uncertain but his undertone denotes tiredness, exhaustion. "We've been through a lot in a pretty short period of time. I think there are still quite a few hours before we need to finish what we came here to do, so what do you guys say?" He finally opens his eyes and looks around, making sure to avoid the¬†sight of the woman laying on the packed soil. "Though I'm fairly sure here is not where we want to¬†have our little shut-eye." At last, he looks at his compatriots to gauge their reaction. "Oh, I'm sorry... were you discussing something?"

"...are you now...?" He squints. Perhaps someone is past due for bedtime. Or trancetime. Whatever elves call it, I don't know. "Oh... maybe you are. Well... pardon, you forgot your name and I forgot some things as well. We're more alike than I thought." He wasn't kidding. Riannoc himself knows that his whole existence is a result of some trick or magic the Wanderer put on him. "I'll make it up to you, if you're able to bring a particular spell scroll from my bag in the material plane, I'll use it to try and cast off the magic that's affecting you here."
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 06-02-2024 22:43
He opens his mouth to protest, but then he tilts his head, thoroughly contemplating the proposition. "I-- really? Now I'm intrigued. I will do so. However, traversing the planes as such, while easy for me, should not be done with such lightness and casualness. There needs to be an important exchange -- whether it be physical, spiritual, or as we have just experienced, an intellectual joust." "Tell you what, lemme know what scroll you want, and I'll fetch it for you, at the low, low price of a filthy, filthy joke. You better make me laugh, cry, cringe, or all three at once." The statue offers his challenge to both shadar brothers at the same time.
Riannoc BOT 06-02-2024 22:50
"...very well. I'll have a go." *Such a weird payment, but being stuck in an obscure location will do wonders to your mind. Who knows what else the bronze elf has done to stave off his boredom? Riannoc looks around, carefully making sure there's no such hidden party that will hear his joke. Satisfied, he finally leans closer to whisper.* "A dwarf walks out of a tavern." Total silence. *That's it, that's the joke. Fucking racist.*
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 06-02-2024 22:59
At first, the statue's eyes open wide in surprise. He was waiting for a naughty joke. But when the punchline of the joke, or rather the absence of such, hits him. He begins to cackle. It sounds like two chunks of metal being rubbed together. He is also slapping his knee in hysteria, loud clanking sounds scare many birds out of the hedge bushes where they were resting. "Oh. OH OH OH. WOW. That's good. That's really good. Ahahahaha." He takes a moment to breathe, not that he needs to. "I'm glad that some things don't go away with the passage of time. Elven ingenuity. And our birth right to make fun of the tubby little rock splitters. These things surely will endure through the end of the multiverse." "Fine. Consider it payment made. Riannoc BOT 07-02-2024 01:06
‚ÄúAh, am I glad that my capacity to entertain does not disappoint. DM [CreamPuff] BOT 07-02-2024 01:10

Riannoc BOT 07-02-2024 13:21

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 07-02-2024 19:47

"But in this case, the trigger is not simple sleep; it is poison from a mushroom, which means we may need to way for it to dissipate. No idea how long that is supposed to take." So what I could do is try to wake myself up, and if that works, get the vial and put it under your noses in the real world and you should all be coming out of it." "Wanna try that?"

Yuki Northernfur BOT 12-02-2024 11:30

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 12-02-2024 20:19

Nyr BOT 12-02-2024 21:49

DM [CreamPuff] BOT 12-02-2024 22:02
In the folded note, the same elegant but not garish script leaves a message:
Ah, what a display of cunning and courage you have allowed me to witness. It's no easy feat, what you and your companions have done thus far. Of course, we knew that your targets would be equally formidable, and no plan can be perfect. Alas, patience and perseverance shall pay off, and I have faith you will find a way to finish the job. It seems you've quickly found and even befriended the key weakness to the pocket plane's impenetrability. I'm asking him to send this to you -- and perhaps when time is right, he will be able to bring you back. My guess is that the boss is going to be a bit spooked and hide like a scared mouse for a little while. Take this cloak, and may it keep you safe. Until next time.
Again, the note is unsigned, but as you read it, you can feel the shimmering energy emanating from the gray cloak. This was the same one that the cloaked figure whom you spotted briefly was wearing, no doubt. It seems like it's been bequeathed to you.
Riannoc BOT 13-02-2024 00:26

"If this unseen friend of ours is none too sappy by our performance, then all the better. I don't expect the finale of this show to be an easy one, regardless. Nyr BOT 13-02-2024 00:35

Yuki Northernfur BOT 13-02-2024 00:51
Yuki opens his eyes slowly and looks around at the scene. He sighs. He slowly stands up without a word, his body aching, his head throbbing. There still seems to be remnants of something hot in his stomach, like ash on which someone has poured water. He isn't feeling great. But he has something important to do. He trudges along, his feet trailing on the floor a bit. Thankfully, it isn't a big room, so he should get to his destination rather quickly. He's panting a bit. Like all the physical strain he had gone through is now manifesting in his body. But he must persevere. He needs to be sure! An arm on the wall to help him move forward, he gets to the tiny sink in the opposite corner of the room. He has yet to say a single word. He has barely looked at his compatriots. His eyes has been fixed to this point on the wall, above the sink. Slowly, painfully slogging towards it. He finally gets there. Both hands on the sink to hold himself up, he looks at it. Intently. The mirror. Or rather his reflection in it. Are there any dicks? (edited)

Riannoc BOT 13-02-2024 01:50
"Honey, are there any dicks on my face?" What a question to start the day. *Yes, Yuki, there are dicks, plural... or maybe it's just yourself? Do you notice I'm just trying to angle this as a philosophical question while in reality it is not, just to fiddle with you and make you waste a few more precious seconds of your life? Maybe we're all dicks, but let's be better, eh?*
1
Lars BOT 13-02-2024 12:28
*After slowly waking up, and allowing Nyr to finish his artwork, Lars sits up and stares at the ground for a while. His companions, joyful and playful, reminisce about their collective time together. A magical, fantastical place full of wonders, colors, emotions and light. The place Lars wanted to return to so dearly. And return he did. Perhaps he would even go back once more, to finish the job with Nyr. But what matters the most is... He went there. At least one last time. There was nothing holding him back now. His only, true, last wish has been fulfilled. It's time to move forward with his own... Plans. He stands up, picking up his things and going to a window. Dicks on his forehead or not, he seems extremely serious.* - Take care, everyone. *He then poofs out, in the manner all-too-familiar by now, leaving smoke and raven feathers behind as he teleports to the streets and disappears in a magical invisibility. There's no more time to waste.*
Riannoc BOT 13-02-2024 12:34
Lo and before you have any chance to complain, Riannoc is also gone by the time you start looking for him, as if he's never there. Toodles <3.
Yuki Northernfur BOT 13-02-2024 13:07
After both Riannoc and Lars have disappeared, Yuki looks at empty space for a second. "Rude..." He turns to Nyr. "Nyr... I know that we had to pull out before we could finish the deed, and you must be feeling frustrated. It is obvious that you would have preferred to spray them with all the pent up emotions you have, to the point of being blue as I can see." He looks Nyr up and down, accentuating his words. "But trust me when I say that you three have been the most genuine friends I have made thus far in this Shithole-capital-S. And yes, the other two are kinda dicks to have bailed so quick, but I'm sure we'll all get pulled back into the same hole again, and we'll love it just as much as I have enjoyed Lars's." "And I'll always be down to help you with the rest of this mission. Just find me. Or send for me. I'll find you." On that note, he looks around for a second, but just heads for the door, because fuck magic, it's for lazy bastards. He can open a door just fine. Show offs. (edited)
1
1
DM [CreamPuff] BOT 13-02-2024 21:30
As Lars reinhabits and readjusts to his own corporeal body, he feels a small voice inside him -- a playful, helpful voice, belonging to Absalom -- giggling. It seems that even though he was not able to bring back the various gear they had found with their astral bodies in the pocket dimension, he took back a trace of the statue-locked plane-shaper wizard's affection and power. @Yokan | [Lars¬π¬π-Wormeyes‚Å∑] GMT-3 Riannoc finds a similar feeling inside him... except it's in the form of a memory. The memory of Aarhus' bored, listless eyes, staring coldly at him, going through the motions of wanting to murder them, but really without any clear purpose. The memory makes him feel cold when plucked like a string. @Josan [Riannoc 12 | Yo 9] +0 Yuki finds himself closing his eyes from time and again, smelling his own scent of a campfire, now that he's back in this body. But if he stills his mind, he can hear the rustling of the tens of thousands of leaves on a hedge bush -- it's almost like they're whispering to him. @Kami | Yuki¬π‚Å∞ | JST +9 Nyr, when thinking back to their final, deadly battle at the center of the maze, feels a pang of bittersweet joy. He's still as conflicted as ever about the mission he set out on, and also about the aftermath... but it's almost as if in helping Evelyn meet her fate and her unexpected demise, he inherited a part of her spark of unbridled joy. @Sharyn„ÄäNyr¬π¬≤„Äã-5 When Nyr opens the small trunk, he wound find it filled to the brim with platinum pieces, which he asks his companions to take... as he's much more curious and interested in figuring out the properties of the cloak he has just inherited. In the chest, a note written from someone anonymous to Aarhus -- about tributes, gang taxes, or whatnot... for the year. Sent to Aarhus for safekeeping. Seems like Absalom detected that the trunk now belongs to no one, and thoughtfully sent it through when he forwarded the cape.
Nyr BOT 14-02-2024 02:00
Nyr stands there and stares at the note. The twins poof out of existence, typical. Yuki says some words, Nyr is deaf to them. He keeps going back and forth in his mind between calling the mission a success or a failure. The reality was, it was a complete failure. While two of the six were dead, there was no satisfaction in their deaths. Nyr's thirst for vengeance was not quenched in the slightest. Tucking the note away he slowly walks to the window and peers out over the town. Yup, shitty old Barovia. Nothing had changed, This place still sucks and Amelia's death was still in vain. "Fuck" He would be dammed if more deaths were on his hands. Running was the right call to make, but he feared it would make things a thousand times harder. Didn't matter, it was too late. Here they were in their home away from home. One thing was certain though: There was much to do. The shadow brothers, for which he was now one of, had some things to button up in this shithole. He owed Yuki a favor or six to repay the Shifter for all he had done. He would get back to the vengeance, no matter how unsatisfying it was. Because it had to be done. The four remaining had to die "Boss Navgeni" "Boss Santander" "Boss Gwerien" He stares at the window. His eyes cutting deep into his own reflection, dramatically accentuated by the pitch dark night sky and the slight drizzle of rain "........Nyrahs Vala'dohr........"
